[03] ^b^viveka^eb^nti vivicca vivitto hutvā. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yaṃ kāmehi ca akusaladhammehi ca vivittena paṭhamadutiyajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ pītisukhaṃ adhigantabbaṃ, sace taṃ vivicca kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṃ nādhigacchati, aññaṃ vā upari dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnañca maggānaṃ vasena santataraṃ sukhaṃ nādhigacchati, tassa ime abhijjhādayo cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantīti. tattha ^b^aratī^eb^ti adhikusalesu dhammesu ukkaṇṭhitatā. ^b^tandī^eb^ti ālasiyabhāvo. evaṃ yo pabbajitvā pabbajitakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, tassa ime satta pāpadhammā uppajjitvā ^a^M3.0127^ea^ cittaṃ pariyādiyantīti dassetvā idāni yassa te dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, soyeva samaṇakiccampi kātuṃ na sakkotīti puna ^b^vivekaṃ anuruddhā...pe0... aññaṃ vā tato santatara^eb^nti āha.
[03] evaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ dassetvā idāni teneva nayena sukkapakkhaṃ dassetuṃ puna ^b^viveka^eb^ntiādimāha. tassattho vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhāyā^eb^ti jānitvā. ^b^eka^eb^nti ^a^P3.0182^ea^ ekaccaṃ. ^b^paṭisevatī^eb^ti sevitabbayuttakaṃ sevati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^upapattīsu byākarotī^eb^ti sappaṭisandhike tāva byākarotu, appaṭisandhike kathaṃ byākarotīti. appaṭisandhikassa puna bhave paṭisandhi natthīti vadanto upapattīsu byākaroti nāma.

[03] ^b^janakuhanattha^eb^nti ^a^V3.0130^ea^ janavimhāpanatthaṃ. ^b^janalapanattha^eb^nti mahājanassa upalāpanatthaṃ. ^b^na iti maṃ jano jānātū^eb^ti evaṃ maṃ mahājano jānissati, evaṃ me mahājanassa antare kittisaddo uggacchissatīti imināpi kāraṇena na byākarotīti attho. ^b^uḷāravedā^eb^ti mahantatuṭṭhino.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ^b^so kho panassa āyasmā^eb^ti so parinibbuto āyasmā imassa ṭhitassa āyasmato. ^b^evaṃsīlo^eb^tiādīsu lokiyalokuttaramissakāva sīlādayo veditabbo. ^b^evaṃdhammo^eb^ti ettha pana samādhipakkhikā dhammā dhammāti adhippetā. ^b^phāsuvihāro hotī^eb^ti tena bhikkhunā pūritapaṭipattiṃ pūrentassa arahattaphalaṃ sacchikatvā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsuvihāro hoti, arahattaṃ pattumasakkontassa paṭipattiṃ pūrayamānassa caratopi phāsuvihāroyeva nāma hoti. iminā nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabboti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] naḷakapānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0131^ea^ ^a^P3.0183^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti goliyānisuttaṃ. tattha ^b^padasamācāro^eb^ti dubbalasamācāro oḷārikācāro, paccayesu sāpekkho mahārakkhitatthero ^a^M3.0128^ea^ viya. taṃ kira upaṭṭhākakule nisinnaṃ upaṭṭhāko āha ``asukattherassa me, bhante, cīvaraṃ dinna''nti. sādhu te kataṃ taṃyeva takketvā viharantassa cīvaraṃ dentenāti. tumhākampi, bhante, dassāmīti. sādhu karissasi taṃyeva takkentassāti āha. ayampi evarūpo oḷārikācāro ahosi. ^b^sappatissenā^eb^ti sajeṭṭhakena, na attānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā viharitabbaṃ. ^b^serivihārenā^eb^ti sacchandavihārena niraṅkusavihārena.

[03] ^b^nānūpakhajjā^eb^ti na anupakhajja na anupavisitvā. tattha yo dvīsu mahātheresu ubhato nisinnesu te anāpucchitvāva cīvarena vā jāṇunā vā ghaṭṭento nisīdati, ayaṃ anupakhajja nisīdati nāma. evaṃ akatvā pana attano pattāasanasantike ṭhatvā nisīdāvusoti vutte nisīditabbaṃ. sace na vadanti, nisīdāmi, bhanteti āpucchitvā nisīditabbaṃ āpucchitakālato paṭṭhāya nisīdāti vuttepi avuttepi nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^na paṭibāhissāmī^eb^ti ettha yo attano pattāsanaṃ atikkamitvā navakānaṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne nisīdati, ayaṃ nave bhikkhū ^a^P3.0184^ea^ āsanena paṭibāhati nāma. tasmiñhi tathā nisinne navā bhikkhū ``amhākaṃ nisīdituṃ na detī''ti ujjhāyantā tiṭṭhanti vā āsanaṃ vā pariyesantā āhiṇḍanti. tasmā attano pattāsaneyeva nisīditabbaṃ. evaṃ na paṭibāhati nāma.

[03] ^b^ābhisamācārikampi dhamma^eb^nti abhisamācārikaṃ vattapaṭipattimattampi. ^b^nātikālenā^eb^ti na atipāto pavisitabbaṃ, na atidivā paṭikkamitabbaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃyeva pavisitabbañca nikkhamitabbañca. atipāto pavisitvā atidivā nikkhamantassa hi cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattādīni parihāyanti. kālasseva mukhaṃ dhovitvā makkaṭakasuttāni chindantena ussāvabindū nipātentena gāmaṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pariyesitvā yāva bhikkhākālā antogāmeyeva nānappakāraṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentena nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā divā nikkhamma ^a^V3.0132^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ pādadhovanavelāya vihāraṃ paccāgantabbaṃ hoti. ^b^na purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjitabba^eb^nti ``yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā pācittiya''nti (pāci0 299) imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhantena tassa ^a^M3.0129^ea^ vibhaṅge vuttaṃ purebhattañca pacchābhattañca cārittaṃ na āpajjitabbaṃ. ^b^uddhato hoti capalo^eb^ti uddhaccapakatiko ceva hoti cīvaramaṇḍana-pattamaṇḍana-senāsanamaṇḍanā imassa vā pūtikāyassa kelāyanā maṇḍanāti evaṃ vuttena ca taruṇadārakāvacāpalyena samannāgato.

[03] ^b^paññavatā^eb^ ^a^P3.0185^ea^ ^b^bhavitabba^eb^nti cīvarakammādīsu itikattabbesu upāyapaññāya samannāgatena bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^ abhidhamme abhivinaye^eb^ti abhidhammapiṭake ceva vinayapiṭake ca pāḷivasena ceva aṭṭhakathāvasena ca yogo karaṇīyo. sabbantimena hi paricchedena abhidhamme dukatikamātikāhi saddhiṃ dhammahadayavibhaṅgaṃ vinā na vaṭṭati. vinaye pana kammākammavinicchayena saddhiṃ suvinicchitāni dve pātimokkhāni vinā na vaṭṭati.

[03] ^b^āruppā^eb^ti ettāvatā aṭṭhapi samāpattiyo vuttā honti. tā pana sabbena sabbaṃ asakkontena sattasupi yogo karaṇīyo, chasupi...pe0... pañcasupi. sabbantimena paricchedena ekaṃ kasiṇe parikammakammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā ādāya vicaritabbaṃ, ettakaṃ vinā na vaṭṭati. ^b^uttarimanussadhamme^eb^ti iminā sabbepi lokuttaradhamme dasseti. tasmā arahantena hutvā vihātabbaṃ, arahattaṃ anabhisambhuṇantena anāgāmiphale sakadāgāmiphale sotāpattiphale vā patiṭṭhātabbaṃ. sabbantimena pariyāyena ekaṃ vipassanāmukhaṃ yāva arahattā paguṇaṃ katvā ādāya vicaritabbaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. imaṃ pana desanaṃ āyasmā sāriputto neyyapuggalassa vasena ābhisamācārikavattato paṭṭhāya anupubbena arahattaṃ pāpetvā niṭṭhāpesīti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] goliyānisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0133^ea^ ^a^P3.0186^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti kīṭāgirisuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kāsīsū^eb^ti evaṃnāmake janapade. ^b^etha tumhepi, bhikkhave^eb^ti etha tumhepi, bhikkhave, ime pañca ānisaṃse ^a^M3.0130^ea^ sampassamānā aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjatha. iti bhagavā rattiṃ vikālabhojanaṃ, divā vikālabhojananti imāni dve bhojanāni ekappahārena ajahāpetvā ekasmiṃ samaye divā vikālabhojanameva jahāpesi, puna kālaṃ atināmetvā rattiṃ vikālabhojanaṃ jahāpento evamāha. kasmā? imāni hi dve bhojanāni vattamānāni vaṭṭe āciṇṇāni samāciṇṇāni nadiṃ otiṇṇaudakaṃ viya anupakkhandāni, nivātesu ca gharesu subhojanāni bhuñjitvā vaḍḍhitā sukhumālā kulaputtā dve bhojanāni ekappahārena pajahantā kilamanti. tasmā ekappahārena ajahāpetvā bhaddālisutte divā vikālabhojanaṃ jahāpesi, idha rattiṃ vikālabhojanaṃ. jahāpento pana na tajjitvā vā niggaṇhitvā vā, tesaṃ pahānapaccayā pana appābādhatañca sañjānissathāti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvāva jahāpesi. ^b^kīṭāgirī^eb^ti tassa nigamassa nāmaṃ.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ^b^assajipunabbasukā^eb^ti assaji ca punabbasuko ca chasu chabbaggiyesu dve gaṇācariyā. paṇḍuko lohitako mettiyo bhummajako ^a^P3.0187^ea^ assaji punabbasukoti ime cha janā ^b^chabbaggiyā^eb^ nāma. tesu paṇḍukalohitakā attano parisaṃ gahetvā sāvatthiyaṃ vasanti, mettiyabhummajakā rājagahe, ime dve janā kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāsikā honti. ^b^āvāsikā^eb^ti nibaddhavāsino, taṃnibandhā akataṃ senāsanaṃ karonti, jiṇṇaṃ paṭisaṅkharonti, kate issarā honti. ^b^kālika^eb^nti anāgate kāle pattabbaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ^b^mayā cetaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^ti idha kiṃ dasseti? bhikkhave, divasassa tayo vāre bhuñjitvā sukhavedanaṃyeva uppādento na imasmiṃ sāsane kiccakārī nāma hoti, ettakā pana vedanā sevitabbā, ettakā na sevitabbāti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. ^b^evarūpaṃ sukhavedanaṃ pajahathā^eb^ti idañca gehassitasomanassavasena vuttaṃ, ^b^upasampajja viharathā^eb^ti idañca nekkhammasitasomanassavasena ^a^V3.0134^ea^. ito paresupi dvīsu vāresu gehassitanekkhammasitānaṃyeva domanassānañca upekkhānañca vasena attho veditabbo.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbavedanaṃ dassetvā idāni yesaṃ appamādena kiccaṃ kattabbaṃ, yesañca na kattabbaṃ, te dassetuṃ ^b^nāhaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^ ^a^M3.0131^ea^, ^b^sabbesaṃyevā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kataṃ tesaṃ appamādenā^eb^ti tesaṃ yaṃ appamādena kattabbaṃ, taṃ kataṃ. ^b^anulomikānī^eb^ti paṭipattianulomāni kammaṭṭhānasappāyāni, yattha vasantena sakkā honti maggaphalāni pāpuṇituṃ. ^b^indriyāni^eb^ ^a^P3.0188^ea^ ^b^samannānayamānā^eb^ti saddhādīni indriyāni samānaṃ kurumānā.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattime, bhikkhave, puggalā^eb^ti idha kiṃ dasseti? yesaṃ appamādena karaṇīyaṃ natthi, te dve honti. yesaṃ atthi, te pañcāti evaṃ sabbepi ime satta puggalā hontīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.

[03] tattha ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto^eb^ti dvīhi bhāgehi vimutto. arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato vimutto, maggena nāmakāyato. so catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ, nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattānāgāmino ca vasena pañcavidho hoti. pāḷi panettha -- ``katamo ca puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto, idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī''ti (pu0 pa0 208) evaṃ abhidhamme aṭṭhavimokkhalābhino vasena āgatā.

[03] ^b^paññāvimutto^eb^ti paññāya vimutto. so sukkhavipassako, catūhi jhānehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattā cattāro cāti imesaṃ vasena pañcavidhova hoti. pāḷi panettha aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepavaseneva āgatā. yathāha -- ``na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo paññāvimutto''ti.

[03] phuṭṭhantaṃ ^a^P3.0189^ea^ sacchikarotīti ^b^kāyasakkhī^eb^. yo jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ ^a^V3.0135^ea^ sacchikaroti, so sotāpattiphalaṭṭhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā chabbidho hontīti veditabbo. tenevāha -- ``idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo kāyasakkhī''ti.

[03] diṭṭhantaṃ ^a^M3.0132^ea^ pattoti ^b^diṭṭhippatto^eb^. tatridaṃ saṅkhepalakkhaṇaṃ -- dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodhoti ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phusitaṃ paññāyāti diṭṭhippatto. vitthārato panesopi kāyasakkhi viya chabbidho hoti. tenevāha -- ``idhekacco puggalo idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti...pe0... ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati puggalo diṭṭhippatto''ti (pu0 pa0 208).

[03] ^b^saddhāvimutto^eb^ti saddhāya vimutto. sopi vuttanayeneva chabbidho hoti. tenevāha -- ``idhekacco puggalo idaṃ dukkhanti -- yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti...pe0... ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ^a^P3.0190^ea^. tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā...pe0... no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassa. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo saddhāvimutto''ti (pu0 pa0 208). etesu hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti, diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati. tasmā yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi na sīghaṃ vahati, saddo suyyati, balavataro vāyāmo kātabbo hoti, evarūpā saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā. yathā pana nisitāsinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi sīghaṃ vahati, saddo na suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ na hoti, evarūpā paññāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā veditabbā.

[03] dhammaṃ anussaratīti ^b^dhammānusārī^eb^. dhammoti paññā, paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetīti attho. ^b^saddhānusārimhi^eb^ ca eseva nayo. ubho panete sotāpattimaggaṭṭhāyeva. vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``yassa ^a^V3.0136^ea^ puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, paññāvāhiṃ paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti ^a^P3.0191^ea^. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo dhammānusārī''ti (pu0 pa0 208). tathā -- ``yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, saddhāvāhiṃ saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo saddhānusārī''ti. ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthārato ^a^M3.0133^ea^ panesā ubhatobhāgavimuttādikathā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ paññābhāvanādhikāre vuttā. tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. yā panesā etesaṃ vibhāgadassanatthaṃ idha pāḷi āgatā, tattha yasmā rūpasamāpattiyā vinā arūpasamāpattiyo nāma natthi, tasmā āruppāti vuttepi aṭṭha vimokkhā vuttāva hontīti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^kāyena phusitvā^eb^ti sahajātanāmakāyena phusitvā. ^b^paññāya cassa disvā^eb^ti paññāya ca etassa ariyasaccadhamme disvā. ^b^ekacce āsavā^eb^ti paṭhamamaggādīhi pahātabbā ekadesāasavā. ^b^tathāgatappaveditā^eb^ti tathāgatena paveditā catusaccadhammā. ^b^paññāya vodiṭṭhā hontī^eb^ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, imasmiṃ samādhi, imasmiṃ vipassanā, imasmiṃ maggo, imasmiṃ phalanti evaṃ atthena atthe kāraṇena kāraṇe ciṇṇacaritattā maggapaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti. ^b^vocaritā^eb^ti vicaritā. ^b^saddhā niviṭṭhā hotī^eb^ti okappanasaddhā patiṭṭhitā hoti. ^b^mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamantī^eb^ti mattāya olokanaṃ khamanti. ^b^saddhāmatta^eb^nti saddhāyeva, itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ ^a^P3.0192^ea^

[03] iti imesu appamādena karaṇīyesu puggalesu tayo paṭividdhamaggaphalā sekhā. tesu anulomasenāsanaṃ sevamānā kalyāṇamitte bhajamānā indriyāni samannānayamānā anupubbena arahattaṃ gaṇhanti. tasmā tesaṃ yathāṭhitova pāḷiattho. avasāne pana dve sotāpattimaggasamaṅgino. tehi tassa maggassa anulomasenāsanaṃ sevitaṃ, kalyāṇamittā bhajitā, indriyāni samannānītāni. upari pana tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya sevamānā bhajamānā samannānayamānā anupubbena arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantīti ayamettha pāḷiattho.

[03] vitaṇḍavādī pana imameva pāḷiṃ gahetvā -- ``lokuttaramaggo na ekacittakkhaṇiko, bahucittakkhaṇiko''ti vadati. so vattabbo -- ``yadi aññena cittena senāsanaṃ paṭisevati, aññena ^a^V3.0137^ea^ kalyāṇamitte bhajati, aññena indriyāni samannāneti, aññaṃ maggacittanti sandhāya tvaṃ `na ekacittakkhaṇiko maggo, bahucittakkhaṇiko'ti vadasi, evaṃ sante senāsanaṃ sevamāno nīlobhāsaṃ pabbataṃ passati, vanaṃ passati, migapakkhīnaṃ ^a^M3.0134^ea^ saddaṃ suṇāti, pupphaphalānaṃ gandhaṃ ghāyati, pānīyaṃ pivanto rasaṃ sāyati, nisīdanto nipajjanto phassaṃ phusati. evaṃ te pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgīpi lokuttaradhammasamaṅgīyeva bhavissati. sace panetaṃ sampaṭicchasi, satthārā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhasi. satthārā hi pañcaviññāṇakāyā ekantaṃ abyākatāva vuttā, taṃsamaṅgissa kusalākusalaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, lokuttaramaggo ca ekantakusalo. tasmā pajahetaṃ vāda''nti paññapetabbo. sace paññattiṃ na upagacchati, ``gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī''ti uyyojetabbo.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ^b^nāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0193^ea^, ^b^bhikkhave, ādikenevā^eb^ti ahaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamameva maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya aññārādhanaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhānaṃ na vadāmi. ^b^anupubbasikkhā^eb^ti karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ. parato padadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^saddhājāto^eb^ti okappaniyasaddhāya jātasaddho. ^b^upasaṅkamatī^eb^ti garūnaṃ samīpaṃ gacchati. ^b^payirupāsatī^eb^ti santike nisīdati. ^b^dhāretī^eb^ti sādhukaṃ katvā dhāreti. ^b^chando jāyatī^eb^ti kattukamyatākusalacchando jāyati. ^b^ussahatī^eb^ti vīriyaṃ karoti. ^b^tuletī^eb^ti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tulayati. ^b^tulayitvā padahatī^eb^ti evaṃ tīraṇavipassanāya tulayanto maggapadhānaṃ padahati. ^b^pahitatto^eb^ti pesitacitto. ^b^kāyena ceva paramasacca^eb^nti nāmakāyena nibbānasaccaṃ sacchikaroti. ^b^paññāya cā^eb^ti nāmakāyasampayuttāya maggapaññāya paṭivijjhati passati.

[03] idāni yasmā te satthu āgamanaṃ sutvā paccuggamanamattampi na akaṃsu, tasmā tesaṃ cariyaṃ garahanto ^b^sāpi nāma, bhikkhave, saddhā nāhosī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kīvadūrevime^eb^ti kittakaṃ dūre ṭhāne. yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi apakkantāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, na pana kiñci āha. ^b^catuppadaṃ veyyākaraṇa^eb^nti catusaccabyākaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassuddiṭṭhassā^eb^ti yassa uddiṭṭhassa. ^b^yopi^eb^ ^a^P3.0194^ea^ ^b^so, bhikkhave, satthā^eb^ti bāhirakasatthāraṃ dasseti. ^b^evarūpī^eb^ti evaṃjātikā. ^b^paṇopaṇaviyā^eb^ti paṇaviyā ca opaṇaviyā ca ^a^V3.0138^ea^. ^b^na upetī^eb^ti na hoti. kayavikkayakāle viya agghavaḍḍhanahāpanaṃ na hotīti attho. ayaṃ goṇo ^a^M3.0135^ea^ kiṃ agghati, vīsati agghatīti bhaṇanto paṇati nāma. na vīsati agghati, dasa agghatīti bhaṇanto opaṇati nāma. idaṃ paṭisedhento āha ``paṇopaṇaviyā na upetī''ti. idāni taṃ paṇopaṇaviyaṃ dassetuṃ evañca no assa, atha naṃ kareyyāma, na ca no evamassa, na naṃ kareyyāmāti āha.

[03] ^b^kiṃ pana, bhikkhave^eb^ti, bhikkhave, yaṃ tathāgato sabbaso āmisehi visaṃsaṭṭho viharati, evaṃ visaṃsaṭṭhassa satthuno evarūpā paṇopaṇaviyā kiṃ yujjissati? ^b^pariyogāhiya vattato^eb^ti pariyogāhitvā ukkhipitvā gahetvā vattantassa. ^b^ayamanudhammo^eb^ti ayaṃ sabhāvo. ^b^jānāti bhagavā, nāhaṃ jānāmī^eb^ti bhagavā ekāsanabhojane ānisaṃsaṃ jānāti, ahaṃ na jānāmīti mayi saddhāya divasassa tayo vāre bhojanaṃ pahāya ekāsanabhojanaṃ bhuñjati. ^b^ruḷahanīya^eb^nti rohanīyaṃ. ^b^ojavanta^eb^nti sinehavantaṃ. ^b^kāmaṃ taco cā^eb^ti iminā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ dasseti. ettha hi taco ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, nhāru ekaṃ, aṭṭhi ekaṃ, maṃsalohitaṃ ekanti evaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā arahattaṃ appatvā na vuṭṭhahissāmīti evaṃ paṭipajjatīti ^a^P3.0195^ea^ dasseti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. desanaṃ pana bhagavā neyyapuggalassa vasena arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpesīti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] kīṭāgirisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0139^ea^ ^a^M3.0136^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti tevijjavacchasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ekapuṇḍarīke^eb^ti puṇḍarīko vuccati setambarukkho, so tasmiṃ ārāme eko puṇḍarīko atthīti ekapuṇḍarīko. ^b^etadahosī^eb^ti tattha pavisitukāmatāya ahosi. ^b^cirassaṃ kho, bhante^eb^ti pakatiyā āgatapubbataṃ upādāya. ^b^dhammassa cānudhamma^eb^nti idha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dhammo nāma, mahājanassa byākaraṇaṃ anudhammo nāma. sesaṃ jīvakasutte (ma0 ni0 2.51 ādayo) vuttanayameva. ^b^na me te^eb^ti ananuññāya ṭhatvā anuññampi paṭikkhipati. ``sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātī''ti hi idaṃ anujānitabbaṃ siyā, -- ``carato ca me...pe0... paccupaṭṭhita''nti idaṃ pana nānujānitabbaṃ. sabbaññutaññāṇena hi āvajjitvā pajānāti. tasmā ananuññāya ṭhatvā anuññampi paṭikkhipanto evamāha.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^ti ettha sakiṃ khīṇānaṃ āsavānaṃ puna khepetabbābhāvā yāvadevāti na vuttaṃ. pubbenivāsañāṇena cettha bhagavā atītajānanaguṇaṃ dasseti, dibbacakkhuñāṇena ^a^P3.0196^ea^ paccuppannajānanaguṇaṃ, āsavakkhayañāṇena lokuttaraguṇanti. iti imāhi tīhi vijjāhi sakalabuddhaguṇe saṃkhipitvā kathesi.

[03] ^b^gihisaṃyojana^eb^nti gihibandhanaṃ gihiparikkhāresu nikantiṃ. ^b^natthi kho vacchā^eb^ti gihisaṃyojanaṃ appahāya dukkhassantakaro nāma natthi. yepi hi santatimahāmatto uggaseno seṭṭhiputto vītasokadārakoti gihiliṅge ṭhitāva arahattaṃ pattā, tepi maggena sabbasaṅkhāresu nikantiṃ ^a^V3.0140^ea^ sukkhāpetvā pattā. taṃ patvā pana na tena liṅgena aṭṭhaṃsu, gihiliṅgaṃ nāmetaṃ hīnaṃ, uttamaguṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkoti. tasmā tattha ṭhito arahattaṃ patvā taṃdivasameva pabbajati vā parinibbāti vā. bhūmadevatā pana tiṭṭhanti. kasmā? nilīyanokāsassa atthitāya. sesakāmabhave manussesu sotāpannādayo tayo tiṭṭhanti, kāmāvacaradevesu ^a^M3.0137^ea^ sotāpannā sakadāgāmino ca, anāgāmikhīṇāsavā panettha na tiṭṭhanti. kasmā? tañhi ṭhānaṃ laḷitajanassa āvāso, natthi tattha tesaṃ pavivekārahaṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhānañca. iti tattha khīṇāsavo parinibbāti, anāgāmī cavitvā suddhāvāse nibbattati. kāmāvacaradevato upari pana cattāropi ariyā tiṭṭhanti.

[03] ^b^sopāsi kammavādī^eb^ti sopi kammavādī ahosi, kiriyampi na paṭibāhittha. tañhi ekanavutikappamatthake attānaṃyeva gahetvā katheti. tadā kira mahāsatto pāsaṇḍapariggaṇhanatthaṃ pabbajito tassapi pāsaṇḍassa nipphalabhāvaṃ ^a^P3.0197^ea^ jānitvā vīriyaṃ na hāpesi, kiriyavādī hutvā sagge nibbattati. tasmā evamāha. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] tevijjavacchasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0141^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti aggivacchasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^na kho aha^eb^nti paṭhamavāre nāhaṃ sassatadiṭṭhikoti vadati, dutiye nāhaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhikoti. evaṃ antānantikādivasena sabbavāresu paṭikkhepo veditabbo. ^b^hoti ca na ca hotī^eb^ti ayaṃ panettha ekaccasassatavādo. ^b^neva hoti na na hotī^eb^ti ayaṃ amarāvikkhepoti veditabbo.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ ^b^sadukkha^eb^nti kilesadukkhena ceva vipākadukkhena ca sadukkhaṃ. ^b^savighāta^eb^nti tesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ vasena saupaghātakaṃ. ^b^saupāyāsa^eb^nti tesaṃyeva vasena saupāyāsaṃ. ^b^sapariḷāha^eb^nti tesaṃyeva vasena sapariḷāhaṃ.

[03] ^b^kiñci diṭṭhigata^eb^nti kāci ekā diṭṭhipi ruccitvā khamāpetvā gahitā atthīti pucchati. ^b^apanīta^eb^nti nīhaṭaṃ apaviddhaṃ. ^b^diṭṭha^eb^nti paññāya diṭṭhaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayavayaṃ addasa, tasmā. ^b^sabbamaññitāna^eb^nti ^a^P3.0198^ea^ sabbesaṃ tiṇṇampi taṇhādiṭṭhimānamaññitānaṃ. ^b^mathitāna^eb^nti tesaṃyeva vevacanaṃ. idāni tāni vibhajitvā dassento ^b^sabbāhaṃkāra-mamaṃkāra-mānānusayāna^eb^nti āha. ettha ^a^M3.0138^ea^ hi ahaṃkāro diṭṭhi, mamaṃkāro taṇhā, mānānusayo māno. ^b^anupādā vimutto^eb^ti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā vimutto.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ^b^na upetī^eb^ti na yujjati. ettha ca ``na upapajjatī''ti idaṃ anujānitabbaṃ siyā. yasmā pana evaṃ vutte so paribbājako ucchedaṃ gaṇheyya, upapajjatīti pana sassatameva, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatīti ekaccasassataṃ, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatīti amarāvikkhepaṃ, tasmā bhagavā -- ``ayaṃ appatiṭṭho anālambo hotu, sukhapavesanaṭṭhānaṃ mā labhatū''ti ananuññāya ṭhatvā anuññampi paṭikkhipi. ^b^ala^eb^nti samatthaṃ pariyattaṃ ^a^V3.0142^ea^. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti paccayākāradhammo. ^b^aññatrayogenā^eb^ti aññattha payogena. ^b^aññatrācariyakenā^eb^ti paccayākāraṃ ajānantānaṃ aññesaṃ ācariyānaṃ santike vasantena.
[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena hi vacchā^eb^ti yasmā tvaṃ sammohamāpādinti vadasi, tasmā taṃyevettha paṭipucchissāmi. ^b^anāhāro^eb^ ^a^P3.0199^ea^ ^b^nibbuto^eb^ti appaccayo nibbuto.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena rūpenā^eb^ti yena rūpena sattasaṅkhātaṃ tathāgataṃ rūpīti paññāpeyya. ^b^gambhīro^eb^ti guṇagambhīro. ^b^appameyyo^eb^ti pamāṇaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyo. ^b^duppariyogāḷho^eb^ti duogāho dujjāno. ^b^seyyathāpi mahāsamuddo^eb^ti yathā mahāsamuddo gambhīro appameyyo dujjāno, evameva khīṇāsavopi. taṃ ārabbha upapajjatītiādi sabbaṃ na yujjati. kathaṃ? yathā parinibbutaṃ aggiṃ ārabbha puratthimaṃ disaṃ gatotiādi sabbaṃ na yujjati, evaṃ.
[03] ^b^aniccatā^eb^ti aniccatāya. ^b^sāre patiṭṭhita^eb^nti lokuttaradhammasāre patiṭṭhitaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] aggivacchasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0143^ea^ ^a^M3.0139^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti mahāvacchasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sahakathī^eb^ti saddhiṃvādo, bahuṃ mayā tumhehi saddhiṃ kathitapubbanti kathaṃ sāreti mettiṃ ghaṭeti. purimāni hi dve suttāni etasseva kathitāni, saṃyuttake abyākatasaṃyuttaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 4.416 ādayo) nāma etasseva kathitaṃ -- ``kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ^a^P3.0200^ea^ abyākatameta''nti evaṃ ekuttaranikāyepi iminā saddhiṃ kathitaṃ atthiyeva. tasmā evamāha. sammāsambuddhopi tassa āgatāgatassa saṅgahaṃ katvā okāsamakāsiyeva. kasmā? ayañhi sassatadiṭṭhiko, sassatadiṭṭhikā ca sīghaṃ laddhiṃ na vissajjenti, vasātelamakkhitapilotikā viya cirena sujjhanti. passati ca bhagavā -- ``ayaṃ paribbājako kāle gacchante gacchante laddhiṃ vissajjetvā mama santike pabbajitvā cha abhiññāyo sacchikatvā abhiññātasāvako bhavissatī''ti. tasmā tassa āgatāgatassa saṅgahaṃ katvā okāsamakāsiyeva. idaṃ panassa pacchimagamanaṃ. so hi imasmiṃ sutte taraṇaṃ vā hotu ataraṇaṃ vā, yaṭṭhiṃ otaritvā udake patamāno viya samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā pabbajissāmīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgato. tasmā dhammadesanaṃ yācanto ^b^sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo^eb^tiādimāha. tassa bhagavā mūlavasena saṃkhittadesanaṃ, kammapathavasena vitthāradesanaṃ desesi. mūlavasena cettha atisaṃkhittā desanā, kammapathavasena saṃkhittā vitthārasadisā. buddhānaṃ pana nippariyāyena vitthāradesanā nāma natthi. catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānampi hi sattapakaraṇe abhidhammapiṭake ca sabbaṃ saṃkhittameva. tasmā mūlavasenāpi kammapathavasenāpi saṃkhittameva desesīti veditabbo.
[03] 194^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^pāṇātipātā veramaṇī kusala^eb^ntiādīsu paṭipāṭiyā sattadhammā kāmāvacarā, anabhijjhādayo tayo catubhūmikāpi vaṭṭanti.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ ^a^P3.0201^ea^ ^b^kho, vaccha, bhikkhuno^eb^ti kiñcāpi aniyametvā vuttaṃ, yathā pana jīvakasutte ca caṅkīsutte ca, evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte ca attānameva sandhāyetaṃ bhagavatā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthi^eb^ ^a^V3.0144^ea^ ^a^M3.0140^ea^ ^b^panā^eb^ti kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati? ayaṃ kirassa laddhi -- ``tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sāsane satthāva arahā hoti, sāvako pana arahattaṃ pattuṃ samattho natthi. samaṇo ca gotamo `yato kho, vaccha, bhikkhuno'ti ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kathento viya katheti, atthi nu kho samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako arahattappatto''ti. etamatthaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati. tattha ^b^tiṭṭhatū^eb^ti bhavaṃ tāva gotamo tiṭṭhatu, bhavañhi loke pākaṭo arahāti attho. tasmiṃ byākate uttari bhikkhunīādīnaṃ vasena pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavāpissa byākāsi.
[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ^b^ārādhako^eb^ti sampādako paripūrako.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ ^b^sekhāya vijjāya pattabba^eb^nti heṭṭhimaphalattayaṃ pattabbaṃ. taṃ sabbaṃ mayā anuppattanti vadati. vitaṇḍavādī panāha -- ``katame dhammā sekkhā? cattāro maggā apariyāpannā heṭṭhimāni ca tīṇi sāmaññaphalānī''ti (dha0 sa0 1023) vacanato arahattamaggopi anena pattoyeva. phalaṃ pana apattaṃ, tassa pattiyā uttari yogaṃ kathāpetīti. so evaṃ saññāpetabbo --
[21] ``yo ^a^P3.0202^ea^ ve kilesāni pahāya pañca,
[27] paripuṇṇasekho aparihānadhammo.
[26] cetovasippatto samāhitindriyo,
[22] sa ve ṭhitattoti naro pavuccatī''ti.. (a0 ni0 4.5).

[03] anāgāmipuggalo hi ekantaparipuṇṇasekho. taṃ sandhāya ``sekhāya vijjāya pattabba''nti āha. maggassa pana ekacittakkhaṇikattā tattha ṭhitassa pucchā nāma natthi. iminā suttena maggopi bahucittakkhaṇiko hotūti ce. etaṃ na buddhavacanaṃ, vuttagāthāya ca attho virujjhati. tasmā anāgāmiphale ṭhatvā arahattamaggassa vipassanaṃ kathāpetīti veditabbo. yasmā panassa na kevalaṃ suddhārahattasseva upanissayo, channampi abhiññānaṃ upanissayo atthi, tasmā bhagavā -- ``evamayaṃ samathe kammaṃ katvā pañca abhiññā nibbattessati ^a^V3.0145^ea^, vipassanāya kammaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati. evaṃ chaḷabhiñño mahāsāvako bhavissatī''ti vipassanāmattaṃ akathetvā samathavipassanā ācikkhi.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ ^b^sati^eb^ ^a^M3.0141^ea^ ^b^satiāyatane^eb^ti sati satikāraṇe. kiñcettha kāraṇaṃ? abhiññā vā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ vā avasāne pana arahattaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ arahattassa vipassanā vāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ^b^pariciṇṇo me bhagavā^eb^ti satta hi sekhā bhagavantaṃ paricaranti nāma, khīṇāsavena bhagavā pariciṇṇo hoti. iti saṅkhepena arahattaṃ byākaronto thero evamāha. te pana bhikkhū tamatthaṃ na jāniṃsu, ajānantāva tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā. bhagavato ārocesuṃ. ^b^devatā^eb^ti tesaṃ guṇānaṃ lābhī devatā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] mahāvacchasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0146^ea^ ^a^P3.0203^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti dīghanakhasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sūkarakhatāya^eb^nti sūkarakhatāti evaṃnāmake leṇe. kassapabuddhakāle kira taṃ leṇaṃ ekasmiṃ buddhantare pathaviyā vaḍḍhamānāya antobhūmigataṃ jātaṃ. athekadivasaṃ eko sūkaro tassa chadanapariyantasamīpe paṃsuṃ khaṇi. deve vuṭṭe paṃsudhoto chadanapariyanto pākaṭo ahosi. eko vanacarako disvā -- ``pubbe sīlavantehi paribhuttaleṇena bhavitabbaṃ, paṭijaggissāmi na''nti samantato paṃsuṃ apanetvā leṇaṃ sodhetvā kuṭṭaparikkhepaṃ katvā dvāravātapānaṃ yojetvā supariniṭṭhita-sudhākammacittakammarajatapaṭṭasadisāya vālukāya santhatapariveṇaṃ leṇaṃ katvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā bhagavato vasanatthāya adāsi. leṇaṃ gambhīraṃ ahosi otaritvā abhiruhitabbaṃ. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^dīghanakho^eb^ti tassa paribbājakassa nāmaṃ. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti kasmā upasaṅkami? so kira there aḍḍhamāsapabbajite cintesi -- ``mayhaṃ mātulo aññaṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā na ciraṃ tiṭṭhati, idāni panassa samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gatassa aḍḍhamāso jāto. pavattimpissa na suṇāmi, ojavantaṃ ^a^M3.0142^ea^ nu kho sāsanaṃ, jānissāmi na''nti gantukāmo jāto. tasmā upasaṅkami. ^b^ekamantaṃ ṭhito^eb^ti tasmiṃ kira samaye thero bhagavantaṃ bījayamāno ṭhito hoti, paribbājako mātule ^a^P3.0204^ea^ hirottappena ṭhitakova pañhaṃ pucchi. tena vuttaṃ ``ekamantaṃ ṭhito''ti.

[03] ^b^sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī^eb^ti sabbā me upapattiyo nakkhamanti, paṭisandhiyo nakkhamantīti adhippāyena vadati. ettāvatānena ``ucchedavādohamasmī''ti dīpitaṃ hoti. bhagavā panassa adhippāyaṃ muñcitvā akkhare tāva dosaṃ dassento ^b^yāpi kho te^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^esāpi te diṭṭhi nakkhamatī^eb^ti esāpi te paṭhamaṃ ruccitvā khamāpetvā gahitadiṭṭhi nakkhamatīti. ^b^esā ce me, bho gotama, diṭṭhi khameyyā^eb^ti mayhañhi sabbaṃ nakkhamatīti diṭṭhi, tassa mayhaṃ yā esā sabbaṃ me nakkhamatīti diṭṭhi, esā me khameyya. yaṃ taṃ ``sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī''ti vuttaṃ, tampissa tādisameva. yathā sabbagahaṇena gahitāpi ayaṃ diṭṭhi khamati, evamevaṃ tampi khameyya ^a^V3.0147^ea^. evaṃ attano vāde āropitaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā taṃ pariharāmīti saññāya vadati, atthato panassa ``esā diṭṭhi na me khamatī''ti āpajjati. yassa panesā na khamati na ruccati, tassāyaṃ tāya diṭṭhiyā sabbaṃ me na khamatīti diṭṭhi rucitaṃ. tena hi diṭṭhiakkhamena arucitena bhavitabbanti sabbaṃ khamatīti ruccatīti āpajjati. na panesa taṃ sampaṭicchati, kevalaṃ tassāpi ucchedadiṭṭhiyā ucchedameva gaṇhāti. tenāha bhagavā ^b^ato kho te, aggivessana,...pe0... aññañca diṭṭhiṃ upādiyantī^eb^ti. tattha ^b^ato^eb^ti pajahanakesu nissakkaṃ, ye pajahanti, tehi ye nappajahantīti vucciyanti, teva bahutarāti attho. ^b^bahū hi bahutarā^eb^ti ettha hikāro nipātamattaṃ, bahū bahutarāti attho. parato ^a^P3.0205^ea^ ^b^tanū hi tanutarā^eb^ti padepi eseva nayo. ^b^ye evamāhaṃsū^eb^ti ye evaṃ vadanti. ^b^tañceva diṭṭhiṃ nappajahanti, aññañca diṭṭhiṃ upādiyantī^eb^ti mūladassanaṃ nappajahanti, aparadassanaṃ upādiyanti.

[03] ettha ca sassataṃ gahetvā tampi appahāya ucchedaṃ vā ekaccasassataṃ vā gahetuṃ na sakkā, ucchedampi gahetvā taṃ appahāya sassataṃ vā ekaccasassataṃ vā na sakkā gahetuṃ, ekaccasassatampi gahetvā taṃ appahāya sassataṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā na sakkā gahetuṃ. mūlasassataṃ pana appahāya ^a^M3.0143^ea^ aññaṃ sassatameva sakkā gahetuṃ. kathaṃ? ekasmiñhi samaye ``rūpaṃ sassata''nti gahetvā aparasmiṃ samaye ``na suddharūpameva sassataṃ, vedanāpi sassatā, viññāṇampi sassata''nti gaṇhāti. ucchedepi ekaccasassatepi eseva nayo. yathā ca khandhesu, evaṃ āyatanesupi yojetabbaṃ. idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``tañceva diṭṭhiṃ nappajahanti, aññañca diṭṭhiṃ upādiyantī''ti.

[03] dutiyavāre ^b^ato^eb^ti appajahanakesu nissakkaṃ, ye nappajahanti, tehi, ye pajahantīti vucciyanti, teva tanutarā appatarāti attho. ^b^tañceva diṭṭhiṃ pajahanti, aññañca diṭṭhiṃ na upādiyantī^eb^ti tañca mūladassanaṃ pajahanti, aññañca dassanaṃ na gaṇhanti. kathaṃ? ekasmiñhi samaye ``rūpaṃ sassata''nti gahetvā aparasmiṃ samaye tattha ādīnavaṃ disvā ``oḷārikametaṃ mayhaṃ dassana''nti pajahati ``na kevalañca rūpaṃ sassatanti dassanameva oḷārikaṃ, vedanāpi sassatā...pe0... viññāṇampi sassatanti dassanaṃ oḷārikamevā''ti vissajjeti ^a^V3.0148^ea^. ucchedepi ekaccasassatepi eseva nayo. yathā ca khandhesu, evaṃ āyatanesupi yojetabbaṃ. evaṃ tañca mūladassanaṃ pajahanti, aññañca dassanaṃ na gaṇhanti.

[03] ^b^santaggivessanā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0206^ea^ kasmā ārabhi? ayaṃ ucchedaladdhiko attano laddhiṃ nigūhati, tassā pana laddhiyā vaṇṇe vuccamāne attano laddhiṃ pātukarissatīti tisso laddhiyo ekato dassetvā vibhajituṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] ^b^sārāgāya santike^eb^tiādīsu rāgavasena vaṭṭe rajjanassa āsannā taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃyojanena vaṭṭasaṃyojanassa santike. ^b^abhinandanāyā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhivaseneva gilitvā pariyādiyanassa gahaṇassa ca āsannāti attho. ^b^asārāgāya santike^eb^tiādīsu vaṭṭe arajjanassa āsannātiādinā nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] ettha ca sassatadassanaṃ appasāvajjaṃ dandhavirāgaṃ, ucchedadassanaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ khippavirāgaṃ. kathaṃ? sassatavādī hi idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānāti, sukatadukkaṭānaṃ phalaṃ atthīti jānāti, kusalaṃ karoti, akusalaṃ karonto bhāyati, vaṭṭaṃ assādeti, abhinandati. buddhānaṃ ^a^M3.0144^ea^ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā sammukhībhūto sīghaṃ laddhiṃ jahituṃ na sakkoti. tasmā taṃ sassatadassanaṃ appasāvajjaṃ dandhavirāganti vuccati. ucchedavādī pana idhalokaparalokaṃ atthīti jānāti, sukatadukkaṭānaṃ phalaṃ atthīti jānāti, kusalaṃ na karoti, akusalaṃ karonto na bhāyati, vaṭṭaṃ na assādeti, nābhinandati, buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā sammukhībhāve sīghaṃ dassanaṃ pajahati. pāramiyo pūretuṃ sakkonto buddho hutvā, asakkonto abhinīhāraṃ katvā sāvako hutvā parinibbāyati. tasmā ucchedadassanaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ khippavirāganti vuccati.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ so pana paribbājako etamatthaṃ ^a^P3.0207^ea^ asallakkhetvā -- ``mayhaṃ dassanaṃ saṃvaṇṇeti pasaṃsati, addhā me sundaraṃ dassana''nti sallakkhetvā ^b^ukkaṃseti me bhava^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] idāni yasmā ayaṃ paribbājako kañjiyeneva tittakālābu, ucchedadassaneneva pūrito, so ^a^V3.0149^ea^ yathā kañjiyaṃ appahāya na sakkā lābumhi telaphāṇitādīni pakkhipituṃ, pakkhittānipi na gaṇhāti, evamevaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ appahāya abhabbo maggaphalānaṃ lābhāya, tasmā laddhiṃ jahāpanatthaṃ ^b^tatraggivessanā^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^viggaho^eb^ti kalaho. ^b^evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hotī^eb^ti evaṃ viggahādiādīnavaṃ disvā tāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti. so hi paribbājako ``kiṃ me iminā viggahādinā''ti taṃ ucchedadassanaṃ pajahati.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā vamitakañjiye lābumhi sappiphāṇitādīni pakkhipanto viya hadaye amatosadhaṃ pūressāmīti vipassanaṃ ācikkhanto ^b^ayaṃ kho pana, aggivessana, kāyo^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho vammikasutte vutto. ^b^aniccato^eb^tiādīnipi heṭṭhā vitthāritāneva. ^b^yo kāyasmiṃ kāyachando^eb^ti yā kāyasmiṃ taṇhā. ^b^sneho^eb^ti taṇhāsnehova. ^b^kāyanvayatā^eb^ti kāyānugamanabhāvo, kāyaṃ anugacchanakakilesoti attho.

[03] evaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento ^b^tisso kho^eb^tiādimāha. puna tāsaṃyeva vedanānaṃ asammissabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye^eb^tiādimāha. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho ^a^M3.0145^ea^ ^a^P3.0208^ea^ -- yasmiṃ samaye sukhādīsu ekaṃ vedanaṃ vedayati, tasmiṃ samaye aññā vedanā attano vāraṃ vā okāsaṃ vā olokayamānā nisinnā nāma natthi, atha kho anuppannāva honti bhinnaudakapupphuḷā viya ca antarahitā vā. ^b^sukhāpi kho^eb^tiādi tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^na kenaci saṃvadatī^eb^ti tassataṃ gahetvā ``sassatavādī aha''nti ucchedavādināpi saddhiṃ na saṃvadati, tameva gahetvā ``sassatavādī aha''nti ekaccasassatavādinā saddhiṃ na vivadati. evaṃ tayopi vādā parivattetvā yojetabbā. ^b^yañca loke vutta^eb^nti yaṃ loke kathitaṃ voharitaṃ, tena voharati aparāmasanto kiñci dhammaṃ parāmāsaggāhena aggaṇhanto. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``yo hoti bhikkhu arahaṃ katāvī,
[27] khīṇāsavo antimadehadhārī.
[26] ahaṃ ^a^V3.0150^ea^ vadāmītipi so vadeyya,
[27] mamaṃ vadantītipi so vadeyya.
[26] loke samaññaṃ kusalo viditvā,
[22] vohāramattena so vohareyyā''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.25).
[25] aparampi vuttaṃ -- ``imā kho citta lokasamaññā lokaniruttiyo lokavohārā lokapaññattiyo, yāhi tathāgato voharati aparāmasa''nti (dī0 ni0 1.440).

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhiññāpahānamāhā^eb^ti sassatādīsu tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sassataṃ abhiññāya jānitvā sassatassa pahānamāha, ucchedaṃ, ekaccasassataṃ abhiññāya ekaccasassatassa pahānaṃ vadati. rūpaṃ abhiññāya rūpassa pahānaṃ vadatītiādinā nayenettha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^paṭisañcikkhato^eb^ti ^a^P3.0209^ea^ paccavekkhantassa. ^b^anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccī^eb^ti anuppādanirodhena niruddhehi āsavehi aggahetvāva cittaṃ vimucci. ettāvatā cesa parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā khudaṃ vinodento viya parassa ^a^M3.0146^ea^ āraddhāya dhammadesanāya ñāṇaṃ pesetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattañceva patto, sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca matthakaṃ, soḷasa ca paññā paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito. dīghanakho pana sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito.

[01] bhagavā pana imaṃ desanaṃ sūriye dharamāneyeva niṭṭhāpetvā gijjhakūṭā oruyha veḷuvanaṃ gantvā sāvakasannipātamakāsi, caturaṅgasamannāgato sannipāto ahosi. tatrimāni aṅgāni -- māghanakkhattena yutto puṇṇamauposathadivaso, kenaci anāmantitāni hutvā attanoyeva dhammatāya sannipatitāni aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni, tesu ekopi puthujjano vā sotāpanna-sakadāgāmi-anāgāmi-sukkhavipassaka-arahantesu vā aññataro natthi, sabbe chaḷabhiññāva, ekopi cettha satthakena kese chinditvā pabbajito nāma natthi, sabbe ehibhikkhunoyevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] dīghanakhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0151^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti māgaṇḍiyasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^agyāgāre^eb^ti aggihomasālayaṃ. ^b^tiṇasanthārake^eb^ti dve māgaṇḍiyā mātulo ca bhāgineyyo ca. tesu mātulo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto, bhāgineyyopi ^a^P3.0210^ea^ saupanissayo nacirasseva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati. athassa bhagavā upanissayaṃ disvā ramaṇīyaṃ devagabbhasadisaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pahāya tattha chārikatiṇakacavarādīhi uklāpe agyāgāre tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññāpetvā parasaṅgahakaraṇatthaṃ katipāhaṃ vasittha. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ taṃdivasameva, yasmā pana taṃ agyāgāraṃ gāmūpacāre dārakadārikāhi okiṇṇaṃ avivittaṃ, tasmā bhagavā niccakālampi divasabhāgaṃ tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vītināmetvā sāyaṃ vāsatthāya tattha upagacchati.

[03] ^b^addasā^eb^ ^a^M3.0147^ea^ ^b^kho...pe0... tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññatta^eb^nti bhagavā aññesu divasesu tiṇasanthārakaṃ saṅgharitvā saññāṇaṃ katvā gacchati, taṃdivasaṃ pana paññapetvāva agamāsi. kasmā? tadā hi paccūsasamaye lokaṃ oloketvāva addasa -- ``ajja māgaṇḍiyo idhāgantvā imaṃ tiṇasanthārakaṃ disvā bhāradvājena saddhiṃ tiṇasanthārakaṃ ārabbha kathāsallāpaṃ karissati, athāhaṃ āgantvā dhammaṃ desessāmi, so dhammaṃ sutvā mama santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati. paresaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthameva hi mayā pāramiyo pūritā''ti tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññapetvāva agamāsi.

[03] ^b^samaṇaseyyānurūpaṃ maññe^eb^ti imaṃ tiṇasanthārakaṃ ``samaṇassa anucchavikā seyyā''ti maññāmi. na ca asaññatasamaṇassa nivutthaṭṭhānametaṃ. tathāhettha hatthena ākaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ vā pādena ākaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ vā sīsena pahaṭaṭṭhānaṃ vā na paññāyati, anākulo anākiṇṇo abhinno ^a^P3.0211^ea^ chekena cittakārena tūlikāya paricchinditvā paññatto viya. saññatasamaṇassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ, kassa bho vasitaṭṭhānanti pucchati. ^b^bhūnahuno^eb^ti hatavaḍḍhino mariyādakārakassa. kasmā evamāha? chasu dvāresu vaḍḍhipaññāpanaladdhikattā. ayañhi tassa laddhi -- cakkhu brūhetabbaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ, adiṭṭhaṃ dakkhitabbaṃ, diṭṭhaṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ. sotaṃ brūhetabbaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ, asutaṃ ^a^V3.0152^ea^ sotabbaṃ, sutaṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ. ghānaṃ brūhetabbaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ, aghāyitaṃ ghāyitabbaṃ, ghāyitaṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ. jivhā brūhetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā, assāyitaṃ sāyitabbaṃ, sāyitaṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ. kāyo brūhetabbo vaḍḍhetabbo, aphuṭṭhaṃ phusitabbaṃ, phuṭṭhaṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ. mano brūhetabbo vaḍḍhetabbo, aviññātaṃ vijānitabbaṃ, viññātaṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ. evaṃ so chasu dvāresu vaḍḍhiṃ paññapeti. bhagavā pana --
[21] ``cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sotena saṃvaro.
[22] ghānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro..
[21] kāyena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu vācāya saṃvaro.
[27] manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro.
[22] sabbattha saṃvuto bhikkhu, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 360-361) --
[25] chasu ^a^M3.0148^ea^ dvāresu saṃvaraṃ paññapeti. tasmā so ``vaḍḍhihato samaṇo gotamo mariyādakārako''ti maññamāno ``bhūnahuno''ti āha.

[03] ^b^ariye ñāye dhamme kusale^eb^ti parisuddhe kāraṇadhamme anavajje. iminā kiṃ dasseti? evarūpassa nāma uggatassa paññātassa yasassino upari vācaṃ bhāsamānena vīmaṃsitvā upadhāretvā mukhe ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā bhāsitabbo ^a^P3.0212^ea^ hoti. tasmā mā sahasā abhāsi, mukhe ārakkhaṃ ṭhapehīti dasseti. ^b^evañhi no sutte ocaratī^eb^ti yasmā amhākaṃ sutte evaṃ āgacchati, na mayaṃ mukhāruḷhicchāmattaṃ vadāma, sutte ca nāma āgataṃ vadamānā kassa bhāyeyyāma, tasmā sammukhāpi naṃ vadeyyāmāti attho. ^b^appossukko^eb^ti mama rakkhanatthāya anussukko avāvaṭo hutvāti attho. ^b^vuttova naṃ vadeyyā^eb^ti mayā vuttova hutvā apucchitova kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā ambajambūādīni gahetvā viya apūrayamāno mayā kathitaniyāmena bhavaṃ bhāradvājo vadeyya, vadassūti attho.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ^b^assosi^eb^ ^a^V3.0153^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti satthā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā māgaṇḍiyaṃ tattha āgataṃ addasa, dvinnaṃ janānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ dibbasotena saddampi assosi. ^b^paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhito. ^b^saṃviggo^eb^ti pītisaṃvegena saṃviggo calito kampito. tassa kira etadahosi -- ``neva māgaṇḍiyena samaṇassa gotamassa ārocitaṃ, na mayā. amhe muñcitvā añño ettha tatiyopi natthi, suto bhavissati amhākaṃ saddo tikhiṇasotena purisenā''ti. athassa abbhantare pīti uppajjitvā navanavutilomakūpasahassāni uddhaggāni akāsi. tena vuttaṃ ``saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto''ti. ^b^atha^eb^ ^a^P3.0213^ea^ ^b^kho māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako^eb^ti paribbājakassa pabhinnamukhaṃ viya bījaṃ paripākagataṃ ñāṇaṃ, tasmā sannisīdituṃ asakkonto āhiṇḍamāno puna satthu santikaṃ āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. taṃ dassetuṃ ``atha kho māgaṇḍiyo''tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ satthā -- ``evaṃ kira tvaṃ, māgaṇḍiya, maṃ avacā''ti avatvāva ^b^cakkhuṃ kho, māgaṇḍiyā^eb^ti paribbājakassa dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. tattha vasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ^a^M3.0149^ea^ rūpaṃ cakkhussa ārāmoti cakkhu ^b^rūpārāmaṃ^eb^. rūpe ratanti ^b^rūparataṃ^eb^. rūpena cakkhu āmoditaṃ pamoditanti ^b^rūpasamuditaṃ. danta^eb^nti nibbisevanaṃ. ^b^gutta^eb^nti gopitaṃ. ^b^rakkhita^eb^nti ṭhapitarakkhaṃ. ^b^saṃvuta^eb^nti pihitaṃ. ^b^saṃvarāyā^eb^ti pidhānatthāya.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ^b^paricāritapubbo^eb^ti abhiramitapubbo. ^b^rūpapariḷāha^eb^nti rūpaṃ ārabbha uppajjanapariḷāhaṃ. ^b^imassa pana te, māgaṇḍiya, kimassa vacanīya^eb^nti imassa rūpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā arahattappattassa khīṇāsavassa tayā kiṃ vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ assa, vuḍḍhihato mariyādakārakoti idaṃ vattabbaṃ, na vattabbanti pucchati. ^b^na kiñci, bho gotamā^eb^ti, bho gotama, kiñci vattabbaṃ natthi. sesadvāresupi eseva nayo.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā tayā pañcakkhandhe pariggahetvā arahattappattassa khīṇāsavassa kiñci vattabbaṃ natthi, ahañca pañcakkhandhe pariggahetvā ^a^P3.0214^ea^ sabbaññutaṃ patto, tasmā ahampi te na kiñci vattabboti dassetuṃ ^b^ahaṃ kho panā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^tassa mayhaṃ māgaṇḍiyā^eb^ti gihikāle attano sampattiṃ dassento āha. tattha ^b^vassiko^eb^tiādīsu yattha sukhaṃ hoti vassakāle ^a^V3.0154^ea^ vasituṃ, ayaṃ vassiko. itaresupi eseva nayo. ayaṃ panettha vacanattho -- vassaṃ vāso vassaṃ, vassaṃ arahatīti ^b^vassiko^eb^. itaresupi eseva nayo.

[03] tattha vassiko pāsādo nātiucco hoti nātinīco, dvāravātapānānipissa nātitanūni nātibahūni, bhūmattharaṇapaccattharaṇakhajjabhojjānipettha missakāneva vaṭṭanti. hemantike thambhāpi bhittiyopi nīcā honti, dvāravātapānāni tanukāni sukhumacchiddāni. uṇhapavesanatthāya bhittiniyūhāni nīharīyanti. bhūmattharaṇapaccattharaṇanivāsanapārupanāni panettha uṇhavīriyāni kambalādīni vaṭṭanti. khajjabhojjaṃ siniddhaṃ kaṭukasannissitañca. gimhike thambhāpi bhittiyopi uccā honti. dvāravātapānāni panettha bahūni vipulajālāni bhavanti. bhūmattharaṇādīni dukūlamayāni vaṭṭanti, khajjabhojjāni madhurarasasītavīriyāni. vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti. tesu tesu padesesu udakayantāni ^a^M3.0150^ea^ karonti, yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.

[03] bodhisattassa pana aṭṭhasatasuvaṇṇaghaṭe ca rajataghaṭe ca gandhodakassa pūretvā nīluppalagacchake katvā sayanaṃ parivāretvā ṭhapayiṃsu. mahantesu lohakaṭāhesu ^a^P3.0215^ea^ gandhakalalaṃ pūretvā nīluppalapadumapuṇḍarīkāni ropetvā utuggahaṇatthāya tattha tattha ṭhapesuṃ. sūriyarasmīhi pupphāni pupphanti. nānāvidhā bhamaragaṇā pāsādaṃ pavisitvā pupphesu rasaṃ gaṇhantā vicaranti. pāsādo atisugandho hoti. yamakabhittiyā antare lohanāḷiṃ ṭhapetvā navabhūmikapāsādassa upari ākāsaṅgaṇe ratanamaṇḍapamatthake sukhumacchiddakaṃ jālaṃ baddhaṃ ahosi. ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ pasāreti. bodhisattassa udakakīḷanavelāya mahiṃsacamme pāsāṇaguḷe khipanti, meghathanitasaddo viya hoti. heṭṭhā yantaṃ parivattenti, udakaṃ abhiruhitvā jālamatthake patati, vassapatanasalilaṃ viya hoti. tadā bodhisatto nīlapaṭaṃ nivāseti, nīlapaṭaṃ pārupati, nīlapasādhanaṃ pasādheti. parivārāpissa cattālīsanāṭakasahassāni nīlavatthābharaṇāneva nīlavilepanāni hutvā mahāpurisaṃ parivāretvā ratanamaṇḍapaṃ gacchanti. divasabhāgaṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷanto sītalaṃ utusukhaṃ anubhoti.

[03] pāsādassa catūsu disāsu cattāro sarā honti. divākāle nānāvaṇṇasakuṇagaṇā pācīnasarato ^a^V3.0155^ea^ vuṭṭhāya viravamānā pāsādamatthakena pacchimasaraṃ gacchanti. pacchimasarato vuṭṭhāya pācīnasaraṃ, uttarasarato dakkhiṇasaraṃ, dakkhiṇasarato uttarasaraṃ gacchanti, antaravassasamayo viya hoti. hemantikapāsādo pana pañcabhūmiko ahosi, vassikapāsādo sattabhūmiko.

[03] ^b^nippurisehī^eb^ti purisavirahitehi. na kevalañcettha tūriyāneva nippurisāni, sabbaṭṭhānānipi nippurisāneva ^a^P3.0216^ea^. dovārikāpi itthiyova, nhāpanādiparikammakarāpi itthiyova. rājā kira -- ``tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati, sā me puttassa ^a^M3.0151^ea^ mā ahosī''ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesi. ^b^tāya ratiyā ramamāno^eb^ti idaṃ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ^b^gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā^eb^ti ettha yasmā khattiyānaṃ setacchattasmiṃyeva patthanā hoti, mahā ca nesaṃ papañco, brāhmaṇā mantehi atittā mante gavesantā vicaranti, gahapatino pana muddāgaṇanamattaṃ uggahitakālato paṭṭhāya sampattiṃyeva anubhavanti, tasmā khattiyabrāhmaṇe aggahetvā ``gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā''ti āha. ^b^āvaṭṭeyyā^eb^ti mānusakakāmahetu āvaṭṭo bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^abhikkantatarā^eb^ti visiṭṭhatarā. ^b^paṇītatarā^eb^ti atappakatarā. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``kusaggenudakamādāya, samudde udakaṃ mine.
[22] evaṃ mānusakā kāmā, dibbakāmāna santike''ti.. (jā0 2.21.389) --
[25] ^b^samadhigayha tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti dibbasukhaṃ gaṇhitvā tato visiṭṭhatarā hutvā tiṭṭhati.

[03] opammasaṃsandanaṃ panettha evaṃ veditabbaṃ -- gahapatissa pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūtakālo viya bodhisattassa tīsu pāsādesu cattālīsasahassaitthimajjhe modanakālo, tassa sucaritaṃ pūretvā sagge nibbattakālo viya bodhisattassa abhinikkhamanaṃ katvā bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaṃ paṭividdhakālo ^a^P3.0217^ea^, tassa nandanavane sampattiṃ anubhavanakālo viya tathāgatassa catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiyā vītivattanakālo, tassa mānusakānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ ^a^V3.0156^ea^ apatthanakālo viya tathāgatassa catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiyā vītināmentassa hīnajanasukhassa apatthanakāloti.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ ^b^sukhī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ dukkhito pacchā sukhito assa. ^b^serī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ vejjadutiyako pacchā serī ekako bhaveyya. ^b^sayaṃvasī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ vejjassa vase vattamāno vejjena nisīdāti vutte nisīdi, nipajjāti vutte nipajji, bhuñjāti vutte bhuñji, pivāti vutte pivi, pacchā sayaṃvasī jāto. ^b^yena kāmaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0152^ea^ ^b^gamo^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ nālattha, pacchā roge vūpasante vanadassana-giridassana-pabbatadassanādīsupi yenakāmaṃ gamo jāto, yattha yattheva gantuṃ icchati, tattha tattheva gaccheyya.

[03] etthāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- purisassa kuṭṭhikālo viya hi bodhisattassa agāramajjhe vasanakālo, aṅgārakapallaṃ viya ekaṃ kāmavatthu, dve kapallāni viya dve vatthūni, sakkassa pana devarañño aḍḍhateyyakoṭiyāni aṅgārakapallāni viya aḍḍhatiyanāṭakakoṭiyo, nakhehi vaṇamukhāni tacchetvā aṅgārakapalle paritāpanaṃ viya vatthupaṭisevanaṃ, bhesajjaṃ āgamma arogakālo viya kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā nikkhamma buddhabhūtakāle catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiyā vītivattanakālo, aññaṃ kuṭṭhipurisaṃ disvā apatthanakālo viya tāya ratiyā vītināmentassa hīnajanaratiyā apatthanakāloti.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ^b^upahatindriyo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0218^ea^ kimirakuṭṭhena nāma upahatakāyappasādo. ^b^upahatindriyā^eb^ti upahatapaññindriyā. te yathā so upahatakāyindriyo kuṭṭhī dukkhasamphassasmiṃyeva aggismiṃ sukhamiti viparītasaññaṃ paccalattha, evaṃ paññindriyassa upahatattā dukkhasamphassesveva kāmesu sukhamiti viparītasaññaṃ paccalatthuṃ.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ^b^asucitarāni cevā^eb^tiādīsu pakatiyāva tāni asucīni ca duggandhāni ca pūtīni ca, idāni pana asucitarāni ceva duggandhatarāni ca pūtitarāni ca honti. ^b^kācī^eb^ti tassa hi paritāpentassa ca kaṇḍūvantassa ca pāṇakā anto pavisanti, duṭṭhalohitaduṭṭhapubbā paggharanti. evamassa kāci assādamattā hoti.

[03] ^b^ārogyaparamā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0157^ea^ gāthāya ye keci dhanalābhā vā yasalābhā vā puttalābhā vā atthi, ārogyaṃ tesaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ, natthi tato uttaritaro lābhoti, ārogyaparamā lābhā. yaṃkiñci jhānasukhaṃ vā maggasukhaṃ vā phalasukhaṃ vā atthi, nibbānaṃ tattha paramaṃ, natthi tato uttaritaraṃ sukhanti nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ. ^b^aṭṭhaṅgiko maggāna^eb^nti pubbabhāgamaggānaṃ pubbabhāgagamaneneva amatagāmīnaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko khemo, natthi tato khemataro ^a^M3.0153^ea^ añño maggo. atha vā ^b^khemaṃ amatagāmina^eb^nti ettha khemantipi amatantipi nibbānasseva nāmaṃ. yāvatā puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇā parappavādā khemagāmino ca amatagāmino cāti laddhivasena gahitā, sabbesaṃ tesaṃ khemāmatagāmīnaṃ maggānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko paramo uttamoti ayamettha attho.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ^b^ācariyapācariyāna^eb^nti ācariyānañceva ācariyācariyānañca. ^b^sametī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0219^ea^ ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya sadisaṃ hoti ninnānākaraṇaṃ. ^b^anomajjatī^eb^ti pāṇiṃ heṭṭhā otārento majjati -- ``idaṃ taṃ, bho gotama, ārogyaṃ, idaṃ taṃ nibbāna''nti kālena sīsaṃ kālena uraṃ parimajjanto evamāha.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ^b^cheka^eb^nti sampannaṃ. ^b^sāhuḷicīrenā^eb^ti kāḷakehi eḷakalomehi katathūlacīrena. saṅkāracoḷakenātipi vadanti. ^b^vācaṃ nicchāreyyā^eb^ti kālena dasāya kālena ante kālena majjhe parimajjanto nicchāreyya, vadeyyāti attho. ^b^pubbakehesā^eb^ti pubbakehi esā. vipassīpi hi bhagavā...pe0... kassapopi bhagavā catuparisamajjhe nisinno imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi, ``atthanissitagāthā''ti mahājano uggaṇhi. satthari parinibbute aparabhāge paribbājakānaṃ antaraṃ paviṭṭhā. te potthakagataṃ katvā padadvayameva rakkhituṃ sakkhiṃsu. tenāha -- ^b^sā etarahi anupubbena puthujjanagāthā^eb^ti.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ rogova bhūtoti ^b^rogabhūto^eb^. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^ariyaṃ cakkhu^eb^nti parisuddhaṃ vipassanāñāṇañceva maggañāṇañca. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti samattho. ^b^bhesajjaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti uddhaṃvirecanaṃ adhovirecanaṃ añjanañcāti bhesajjaṃ kareyya.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ^b^na cakkhūni uppādeyyā^eb^ti yassa hi antarā pittasemhādipaliveṭhena ^a^P3.0220^ea^ cakkhupasādo ^a^V3.0158^ea^ upahato hoti, so chekaṃ vejjaṃ āgamma sappāyabhesajjaṃ sevanto cakkhūni uppādeti nāma. jaccandhassa pana ^a^M3.0154^ea^ mātukucchiyaṃyeva vinaṭṭhāni, tasmā so na labhati. tena vuttaṃ ``na cakkhūni uppādeyyā''ti.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ dutiyavāre ^b^jaccandho^eb^ti jātakālato paṭṭhāya pittādipaliveṭhena andho. ^b^amusmi^eb^nti tasmiṃ pubbe vutte. ^b^amittatopi daheyyā^eb^ti amitto me ayanti evaṃ amittato ṭhapeyya. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^iminā cittenā^eb^ti vaṭṭe anugatacittena. ^b^tassa me upādānapaccayā^eb^ti ekasandhi dvisaṅkhepo paccayākāro kathito, vaṭṭaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammānudhamma^eb^nti dhammassa anudhammaṃ anucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ. ^b^ime rogā gaṇḍā sallā^eb^ti pañcakkhandhe dasseti. ^b^upādānanirodhā^eb^ti vivaṭṭaṃ dassento āha. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] māgaṇḍiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0159^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti sandakasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^pilakkhaguhāya^eb^nti tassā guhāya dvāre pilakkharukkho ahosi, tasmā pilakkhaguhātveva saṅkhaṃ gatā. ^b^paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti vivekato vuṭṭhito. ^b^devakatasobbho^eb^ti vassodakeneva tinnaṭṭhāne jāto mahāudakarahado. ^b^guhādassanāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^guhā^eb^ti paṃsuguhā. sā unname ^a^P3.0221^ea^ udakamuttaṭṭhāne ahosi, ekato umaṅgaṃ katvā khāṇuke ca paṃsuñca nīharitvā anto thambhe ussāpetvā matthake padaracchannagehasaṅkhepena katā, tattha te paribbājakā vasanti. sā vassāne udakapuṇṇā tiṭṭhati, nidāghe tattha vasanti. taṃ sandhāya ``guhādassanāyā''ti āha. vihāradassanatthañhi anamataggiyaṃ paccavekkhitvā samuddapabbatadassanatthaṃ vāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti.

[03] ^b^unnādiniyā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0155^ea^ uccaṃ nadamānāya. evaṃ nadamānāya cassā uddhaṅgamanavasena ucco, disāsu patthaṭavasena mahāsaddoti uccāsaddamahāsaddo, tāya ^b^uccāsaddamahāsaddāya^eb^. tesaṃ paribbājakānaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya kattabbaṃ nāma cetiyavattaṃ vā bodhivattaṃ vā ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ vā yonisomanasikāro vā natthi. tena te pātova uṭṭhāya bālātape nisinnā, sāyaṃ vā kathāya phāsukatthāya sannipatitā ``imassa hattho sobhaṇo imassa pādo''ti evaṃ aññamaññassa hatthapādādīni vā ārabbha itthipurisadārakadārikāvaṇṇe vā aññaṃ vā kāmassādabhavassādādivatthuṃ ārabbha kathaṃ paṭṭhapetvā anupubbena rājakathādianekavidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathenti. sā hi aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā kathāti ^b^tiracchānakathā^eb^. tattha rājānaṃ ārabbha ``mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃmahānubhāvo''tiādinā nayena pavattā kathā ^b^rājakathā^eb^. esa nayo ^b^corakathādīsu^eb^.

[03] tesu ``asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo''tiādinā ^a^P3.0222^ea^ nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti. ``sopi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvo khayaṃ gato''ti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati. coresupi ``mūladevo evaṃmahānubhāvo, meghamālo evaṃmahānubhāvo''ti tesaṃ ^a^V3.0160^ea^ kammaṃ paṭicca aho sūrāti gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā. yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu ``asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho''ti kāmassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā. ``tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā''ti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kathā kammaṭṭhānameva hoti. apica annādīsu ``evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimha pivimha paribhuñjimhā''ti kāmassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā -- ``pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha, cetiye pūjaṃ akarimhā''ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03] ^b^ñātikathādīsupi^eb^ ``amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā''ti vā ``pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi carimhā''ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā ``tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā''ti vā ``pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā''ti vā kathetabbā. ^b^gāmakathāpi^eb^ suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena vā ``asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā''ti vā evaṃ assādavasena na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā saddhā pasannāti ^a^M3.0156^ea^ vā khayavayaṃ gatāti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^nigamanagarajanapadakathāsupi^eb^ eseva nayo. ^b^itthikathāpi^eb^ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati, saddhā pasannā khayaṃ gatāti evameva vaṭṭati. ^b^sūrakathāpi^eb^ ^a^P3.0223^ea^ nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosīti assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati, saddho pasanno ahosi khayaṃ gatoti evameva vaṭṭati. ^b^visikhākathāpi^eb^ asukā visikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthāti assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati, saddhā pasannā khayaṃ gatā iccevaṃ vaṭṭati.

[03] ^b^kumbhaṭṭhānakathā^eb^ti kumbhaṭṭhānaudakatitthakathā vā vuccati kumbhadāsikathā vā. sāpi ``pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā''ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, saddhā pasannātiādinā nayeneva vaṭṭati. ^b^pubbapetakathā^eb^ti atītañātikathā. tattha vattamānañātikathāsadisova vinicchayo.

[03] ^b^nānattakathā^eb^ti purimapacchimakathāvimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā. ^b^lokakkhāyikā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0161^ea^ ayaṃ loko kena nimmito, asukena nāma nimmito, kākā setā aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā, bakā rattā lohitassa rattattāti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā.

[03] ^b^samuddakkhāyikā^eb^ nāma kasmā samuddo sāgaro, sāgaradevena khaṇitattā sāgaro, khato meti hatthamuddāya niveditattā samuddoti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyikakathā. iti bhavo, iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā ^b^itibhavābhavakathā^eb^. ettha ca bhavoti sassataṃ, abhavoti ucchedaṃ. bhavoti vaḍḍhi, abhavoti ^a^P3.0224^ea^ hāni. bhavoti kāmasukhaṃ, abhavoti attakilamatho. iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsatiracchānakathā nāma hoti. evarūpiṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentiyā nisinno hoti.

[03] tato sandako paribbājako te paribbājake oloketvā -- ``ime paribbājakā ativiya aññamaññaṃ agāravā appatissā, mayañca samaṇassa ^a^M3.0157^ea^ gotamassa pātubhāvato paṭṭhāya sūriyuggamane khajjopanakūpamā jātā, lābhasakkāropi no parihīno. sace pana imaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṇo gotamo gotamasāvako vā gihiupaṭṭhākopi vāssa āgaccheyya, ativiya lajjanīyaṃ bhavissati. parisadoso kho pana parisajeṭṭhakasseva upari ārohatī''ti ito cito ca vilokento theraṃ addasa. tena vuttaṃ ^b^addasā kho sandako paribbājako...pe0... tuṇhī ahesu^eb^nti.

[03] tattha ^b^saṇṭhapesī^eb^ti sikkhāpesi, vajjamassā paṭicchādesi. yathā suṭṭhapitā hoti, tathā naṃ ṭhapesi. yathā nāma parisamajjhaṃ pavisanto puriso vajjapaṭicchādanatthaṃ nivāsanaṃ saṇṭhapeti, pārupanaṃ saṇṭhapeti, rajokiṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ puñchati, evamassā vajjapaṭicchādanatthaṃ ``appasaddā bhonto''ti sikkhāpento yathā suṭṭhapitā hoti, tathā naṃ ṭhapesīti attho. ^b^appasaddakāmā^eb^ti appasaddaṃ icchanti, ekakā nisīdanti, ekakā tiṭṭhanti, na gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya yāpenti. ^b^appasaddavinītā^eb^ti appasaddena niravena buddhena vinītā. ^b^appasaddassa^eb^ ^a^P3.0225^ea^ ^b^vaṇṇavādino^eb^ti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ appasaddaṃ nissaddaṃ. tassa vaṇṇavādino. ^b^upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññeyyā^eb^ti idhāgantabbaṃ maññeyya.

[03] kasmā panesa therassa upasaṅkamanaṃ paccāsīsatīti. attano vuddhiṃ patthayamāno. paribbājakā ^a^V3.0162^ea^ kira buddhesu vā buddhasāvakesu vā attano santikaṃ āgatesu -- ``ajja amhākaṃ santikaṃ samaṇo gotamo āgato, sāriputto āgato, na kho panete yassa vā tassa vā santikaṃ gacchanti, passatha amhākaṃ uttamabhāva''nti attano upaṭṭhākānaṃ santike attānaṃ ukkhipanti ucce ṭhāne ṭhapenti. bhagavatopi upaṭṭhāke gaṇhituṃ vāyamanti. te kira bhagavato upaṭṭhāke disvā evaṃ vadanti -- ``tumhākaṃ satthā bhavaṃ gotamopi gotamassa sāvakāpi amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchanti, mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ samaggā. tumhe pana amhe akkhīhi passituṃ na icchatha, sāmīcikammaṃ na karotha, kiṃ vo amhehi aparaddha''nti. appekacce manussā -- ``buddhāpi etesaṃ santikaṃ gacchanti, kiṃ amhāka''nti tato paṭṭhāya te disvā nappamajjanti. ^b^tuṇhī ahesu^eb^nti sandakaṃ parivāretvā nissaddā nisīdiṃsu.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ^b^svāgataṃ bhoto ānandassā^eb^ti suāgamanaṃ bhoto ānandassa. bhavante hi no āgate ānando hoti, gate sokoti ^a^M3.0158^ea^ dīpeti. ^b^cirassaṃ kho^eb^ti piyasamudācāravacanametaṃ. thero pana kālena kālaṃ paribbājakārāmaṃ cārikatthāya gacchatīti purimagamanaṃ gahetvā evamāha. evañca pana vatvā na mānatthaddho hutvā nisīdi, attano pana āsanā vuṭṭhāya taṃ āsanaṃ papphoṭetvā theraṃ āsanena nimantento ^b^nisīdatu bhavaṃ ānando, idamāsanaṃ paññatta^eb^nti āha.

[03] ^b^antarākathā^eb^ ^a^P3.0226^ea^ ^b^vippakatā^eb^ti nisinnānaṃ vo ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva mamāgamanaṃ etasmiṃ antare kā nāma kathā vippakatā, mamāgamanapaccayā katamā kathā pariyantaṃ na gatāti pucchati.

[03] atha paribbājako ``niratthakakathāva esā nissārā vaṭṭasannissitā, na tumhākaṃ purato vattabbataṃ arahatī''ti dīpento ^b^tiṭṭhatesā, bho^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^nesā bhoto^eb^ti sace bhavaṃ sotukāmo bhavissati, pacchāpesā kathā na dullabhā bhavissati, amhākaṃ panimāya attho natthi. bhoto pana āgamanaṃ labhitvā aññadeva sukāraṇaṃ kathaṃ sotukāmamhāti dīpeti. tato dhammadesanaṃ yācanto ^b^sādhu vata bhavantaṃ ye vā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ācariyake^eb^ti ācariyasamaye. ^b^anassāsikānī^eb^ti assāsavirahitāni. ^b^sasakka^eb^nti ekaṃsatthe nipāto, viññū puriso ekaṃseneva ^a^V3.0163^ea^ na vaseyyāti attho. ^b^vasanto ca nārādheyyā^eb^ti na sampādeyya, na paripūreyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusala^eb^nti kāraṇabhūtaṃ anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ dhammaṃ.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke. ^b^natthi dinna^eb^ntiādīni sāleyyakasutte (ma0 ni0 1.440) vuttāni. ^b^cātumahābhūtiko^eb^ti catumahābhūtamayo. ^b^pathavī pathavīkāya^eb^nti ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu bāhirapathavīdhātuṃ. ^b^anupetī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0227^ea^ anuyāti. ^b^anupagacchatī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ, anugacchatītipi attho, ubhayenāpi upeti upagacchatīti dasseti. āpādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti. ^b^āsandipañcamā^eb^ti nipannamañcena pañcamā, mañco ceva, cattāro mañcapāde gahetvā ṭhitā cattāro purisā cāti attho. ^b^yāvāḷāhanā^eb^ti yāva susānā. ^b^padānī^eb^ti ayaṃ evaṃ sīlavā ahosi, evaṃ dussīlotiādinā nayena pavattāni ^a^M3.0159^ea^ guṇapadāni. sarīrameva vā ettha padānīti adhippetaṃ. ^b^kāpotakānī^eb^ti kapotakavaṇṇāni, pārāvatapakkhavaṇṇānīti attho.

[03] ^b^bhassantā^eb^ti bhasmantā, ayameva vā pāḷi. ^b^āhutiyo^eb^ti yaṃ paheṇakasakkārādibhedaṃ dinnadānaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ chārikāvasānameva hoti, na tato paraṃ phaladāyakaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho. ^b^dattupaññatta^eb^nti dattūhi bālamanussehi paññattaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- bālehi abuddhīhi paññattamidaṃ dānaṃ, na paṇḍitehi. bālā denti, paṇḍitā gaṇhantīti dasseti. ^b^atthikavāda^eb^nti atthi dinnaṃ dinnaphalanti imaṃ atthikavādaṃyeva vadanti tesaṃ tucchaṃ vacanaṃ musāvilāpo. ^b^bāle^eb^ ^a^P3.0228^ea^ ^b^ca paṇḍite cā^eb^ti bālā ca paṇḍitā ca.

[03] ^b^akatena me ettha kata^eb^nti mayhaṃ akateneva samaṇakammena ettha etassa samaye kammaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti, avusiteneva brahmacariyena vusitaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ samaṇadhamme. ^b^samasamā^eb^ti ativiya samā, samena vā guṇena samā. ^b^sāmaññaṃ pattā^eb^ti samānabhāvaṃ pattā.
[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ^b^karato^eb^tiādīni apaṇṇakasutte vuttāni. ^b^tathā natthi hetū^eb^tiādīni.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ catutthabrahmacariyavāse ^a^V3.0164^ea^ ^b^akaṭā^eb^ti akatā. ^b^akaṭavidhā^eb^ti akatavidhānā, evaṃ karohīti kenaci kārāpitā na hontīti attho. ^b^animmitā^eb^ti iddhiyāpi na nimmitā. ^b^animmātā^eb^ti animmāpitā. keci animmitabbāti padaṃ vadanti, taṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sandissati. ^b^vañjhā^eb^ti vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā, kassaci ajanakāti attho. etena pathavīkāyādīnaṃ rūpādijanakabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. pabbatakūṭā viya ṭhitāti ^b^kūṭaṭṭhā. īsikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā^eb^ti muñje īsikā viya ṭhitā. tatrāyamadhippāyo -- yamidaṃ jāyatīti vuccati, taṃ muñjato īsikā viya vijjamānameva nikkhamatīti. ``esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā''tipi ^a^P3.0229^ea^ pāṭho, sunikhāto esikatthambho niccalo tiṭṭhati, evaṃ ṭhitāti attho. ubhayenapi tesaṃ vināsābhāvaṃ dīpeti. ^b^na iñjantī^eb^ti esikatthambho viya ṭhitattā na calanti. ^b^na vipariṇāmentī^eb^ti pakatiṃ na jahanti. ^b^na aññamaññaṃ byābādhentī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ na upahananti. ^b^nāla^eb^nti na samatthā.

[03] ^b^pathavīkāyo^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M3.0160^ea^ pathavīyeva pathavīkāyo, pathavīsamūho vā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu jīvasattamesu kāyesu. ^b^natthi hantā vā^eb^ti hantuṃ vā ghātetuṃ vā sotuṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā jānituṃ vā jānāpetuṃ vā samattho nāma natthīti dīpeti. ^b^sattannaṃtveva kāyāna^eb^nti yathā muggarāsiādīsu pahaṭaṃ satthaṃ muggarāsiādīnaṃ antarena pavisati, evaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antarena chiddena vivarena satthaṃ pavisati. tattha ``ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī''ti kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hotīti dasseti. ^b^yonipamukhasatasahassānī^eb^ti pamukhayonīnaṃ ^a^P3.0230^ea^ uttamayonīnaṃ cuddasasatasahassāni aññāni ca saṭṭhisatāni aññāni ca chasatāni. ^b^pañca ca kammuno satānī^eb^ti pañca kammasatāni ca, kevalaṃ takkamattakena niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ dīpeti. ^b^pañca ca kammāni tīṇi ca kammānī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. keci panāhu ^b^pañca kammānī^eb^ti pañcindriyavasena bhaṇati. ^b^tīṇī^eb^ti kāyakammādivasenāti. ^b^kamme ca aḍḍhakamme cā^eb^ti ettha panassa kāyakammañca vacīkammañca kammanti laddhi, manokammaṃ upaḍḍhakammanti. ^b^dvaṭṭhipaṭipadā^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhi paṭipadāti vadati. ^b^dvaṭṭhantarakappā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ kappe catusaṭṭhi antarakappā nāma honti, ayaṃ pana aññe dve ajānanto evamāha. ^b^chaḷābhijātiyo^eb^ apaṇṇakasutte vitthāritā.

[03] ^b^aṭṭha purisabhūmiyo^eb^ti mandabhūmi khiḍḍābhūmi vīmaṃsakabhūmi ujugatabhūmi sekkhabhūmi samaṇabhūmi ^a^V3.0165^ea^ jinabhūmi pannabhūmīti imā aṭṭha purisabhūmiyoti vadati. tattha jātadivasato paṭṭhāya sattadivase sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhantattā sattā mandā honti momūhā. ayaṃ mandabhūmīti vadati. ye pana duggatito āgatā honti, te abhiṇhaṃ rodanti ceva viravanti ^a^P3.0231^ea^ ca. sugatito āgatā taṃ anussaritvā anussaritvā hasanti. ayaṃ khiḍḍābhūmi nāma. mātāpitūnaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ vīmaṃsakabhūmi nāma. padasāva gantuṃ samatthakālo ujugatabhūmi nāma. sippānaṃ sikkhanakālo sekkhabhūmi nāma. gharā nikkhamma pabbajanakālo samaṇabhūmi nāma. ācariyaṃ sevitvā jānanakālo jinabhūmi nāma. bhikkhu ca pannako jino na kiñci āhāti evaṃ alābhiṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadati.

[03] ^b^ekūnapaññāsa^eb^ ^a^M3.0161^ea^ ^b^ājīvasate^eb^ti ekūnapaññāsa ājīvavuttisatāni. ^b^paribbājakasate^eb^ti paribbājakapabbajjasatāni. ^b^nāgāvāsasate^eb^ti nāgamaṇḍalasatāni. ^b^vīse indriyasate^eb^ti vīsa indriyasatāni. ^b^tiṃse nirayasate^eb^ti tiṃsa nirayasatāni. ^b^rajodhātuyo^eb^ti rajaokiraṇaṭṭhānāni. hatthapiṭṭhipādapiṭṭhādīni sandhāya vadati. ^b^satta saññīgabbhā^eb^ti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhājapasumigamahiṃse sandhāya vadati. ^b^asaññīgabbhā^eb^ti sāliyavagodhumamuggakaṅguvarakakudrūsake sandhāya vadati. ^b^nigaṇṭhigabbhā^eb^ti nigaṇṭhimhi jātagabbhā, ucchuveḷunaḷādayo sandhāya vadati. ^b^satta devā^eb^ti bahū devā, so pana sattāti vadati. mānusāpi ^a^P3.0232^ea^ anantā, so sattāti vadati. ^b^satta pisācā^eb^ti pisācā mahantā, sattāti vadati.

[03] ^b^sarā^eb^ti mahāsarā. kaṇṇamuṇḍa-rathakāra-anotatta-sīhapapātakuḷira-mucalinda-kuṇāladahe gahetvā vadati. ^b^pavuṭā^eb^ti gaṇṭhikā. ^b^papātā^eb^ti mahāpapātā. ^b^papātasatānī^eb^ti khuddakapapātasatāni. ^b^supinā^eb^ti mahāsupinā. ^b^supinasatānī^eb^ti khuddakasupinasatāni. ^b^mahākappino^eb^ti mahākappānaṃ. ettha ekamhā sarā vassasate vassasate kusaggena ekaṃ udakabinduṃ nīharitvā nīharitvā sattakkhattuṃ tamhi sare nirudake kate eko mahākappoti vadati. evarūpānaṃ mahākappānaṃ caturāsītisatasahassāni khepetvā bālā ca paṇḍitā ca dukkhassantaṃ karontīti ayamassa laddhi. paṇḍitopi kira antarā sujjhituṃ na sakkoti, bālopi tato uddhaṃ na gacchati.

[03] ^b^sīlenā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0166^ea^ acelakasīlena vā aññena vā yena kenaci. ^b^vatenā^eb^ti tādisena vatena. ^b^tapenā^eb^ti tapokammena. aparipakkaṃ paripāceti nāma yo ``ahaṃ paṇḍito''ti antarā visujjhati. paripakkaṃ ^a^P3.0233^ea^ phussa phussa byantiṃ karoti nāma yo ``ahaṃ bālo''ti vuttaparimāṇaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā yāti. ^b^hevaṃ natthī^eb^ti evaṃ natthi. tañhi ubhayampi na sakkā kātunti dīpeti. ^b^doṇamite^eb^ti doṇena mitaṃ viya. ^b^sukhadukkhe^eb^ti sukhadukkhaṃ. ^b^pariyantakate^eb^ti vuttaparimāṇena kālena katapariyanto. ^b^natthi hāyanavaḍḍhane^eb^ti natthi hāyanavaḍḍhanāni. na saṃsāro paṇḍitassa hāyati, na bālassa vaḍḍhatīti attho. ^b^ukkaṃsāvakaṃse^eb^ti ukkaṃsāvakaṃsā, hāpanavaḍḍhanānamevetaṃ vevacanaṃ. idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento ^a^M3.0162^ea^ ^b^seyyathāpi nāmā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^suttaguḷe^eb^ti veṭhetvā katasuttaguḷaṃ. ^b^nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletī^eb^ti pabbate vā rukkhagge vā ṭhatvā khittaṃ suttapamāṇena nibbeṭhiyamānaṃ gacchati, sutte khīṇe tattha tiṭṭhati na gacchati. evamevaṃ vuttakālato uddhaṃ na gacchatīti dasseti.
[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ^b^kimida^eb^nti kimidaṃ tava aññāṇaṃ, kiṃ sabbaññu nāma tvanti evaṃ puṭṭho samāno niyativāde pakkhipanto ^b^suññaṃ me agāra^eb^ntiādimāha.
[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ^b^anussaviko hotī^eb^ti anussavanissito hoti. ^b^anussavasacco^eb^ti savanaṃ saccato gahetvā ṭhito. ^b^piṭakasampadāyā^eb^ti vaggapaṇṇāsakāya piṭakaganthasampattiyā.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ^b^mando^eb^ti mandapañño. ^b^momūho^eb^ti atimūḷho. ^b^vācāvikkhepaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti vācāya vikkhepaṃ āpajjati. kīdisaṃ? amarāvikkhepaṃ, apariyantavikkhepanti attho. atha ^a^P3.0234^ea^ vā amarā nāma macchajāti. sā ummujjananimmujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gahetuṃ na sakkāti evameva ayampi vādo ito cito ca sandhāvati, gāhaṃ na upagacchatīti amarāvikkhepoti vuccati. taṃ amarāvikkhepaṃ.

[03] ^b^evantipi me no^eb^tiādīsu idaṃ kusalanti puṭṭho ``evantipi me no''ti vadati, tato kiṃ akusalanti vutte ``tathātipi me no''ti vadati, kiṃ ubhayato aññathāti vutte ``aññathātipi me no''ti vadati, tato tividhenāpi na hotīti te laddhīti vutte ``notipi me ^a^V3.0167^ea^ no''ti vadati, tato kiṃ no noti te laddhīti vutte ``no notipi me no''ti vikkhepamāpajjati, ekasmimpi pakkhe na tiṭṭhati. ^b^nibbijja pakkamatī^eb^ti attanopi esa satthā avassayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, mayhaṃ kiṃ sakkhissatīti nibbinditvā pakkamati. purimesupi anassāsikesu eseva nayo.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ ^b^sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitu^eb^nti yathā pubbe gihibhūto sannidhiṃ katvā vatthukāme paribhuñjati, evaṃ tilataṇḍulasappinavanītādīni sannidhiṃ katvā idāni paribhuñjituṃ abhabboti attho. nanu ca khīṇāsavassa vasanaṭṭhāne ^a^M3.0163^ea^ tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantīti. no na paññāyanti, na panesa te attano atthāya ṭhapeti, aphāsukapabbajitādīnaṃ atthāya ṭhapeti. anāgāmissa ^a^P3.0235^ea^ kathanti. tassāpi pañca kāmaguṇā sabbasova pahīnā, dhammena pana laddhaṃ vicāretvā paribhuñjati.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ ^b^puttamatāya puttā^eb^ti so kira imaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā ājīvakā matā nāmāti saññī hutvā evamāha. ayañhettha attho -- ājīvakā matā nāma, tesaṃ mātā puttamatā hoti, iti ājīvakā puttamatāya puttā nāma honti. ^b^samaṇe gotame^eb^ti samaṇe gotame brahmacariyavāso atthi, aññattha natthīti dīpeti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] sandakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0168^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti mahāsakuludāyisuttaṃ. tattha ^b^moranivāpe^eb^ti tasmiṃ ṭhāne morānaṃ abhayaṃ ghosetvā bhojanaṃ adaṃsu. tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^moranivāpo^eb^ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. ^b^annabhāro^eb^ti ekassa paribbājakassa nāmaṃ. tathā ^b^varadharo^eb^ti. ^b^aññe cā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ ime tayo, aññepi abhiññātā bahū paribbājakā. ^b^appasaddassa vaṇṇavādī^eb^ti idha appasaddavinītoti avatvāva idaṃ vuttaṃ. kasmā? na hi bhagavā aññena vinītoti.

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ^b^purimānī^eb^ti hiyyodivasaṃ upādāya purimāni nāma honti, tato paraṃ purimatarāni. ^b^kutūhalasālāya^eb^nti kutūhalasālā nāma paccekasālā natthi, yattha pana nānātitthiyā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nānāvidhaṃ kathaṃ pavattenti, sā bahūnaṃ -- ``ayaṃ kiṃ vadati ^a^P3.0236^ea^, ayaṃ kiṃ vadatī''ti kutūhaluppattiṭṭhānato ``kutūhalasālā''ti vuccati. ``kotūhalasālā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^lābhā^eb^ti ye evarūpe samaṇabrāhmaṇe daṭṭhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ ^a^M3.0164^ea^ dhammakathaṃ vā nesaṃ sotuṃ labhanti, tesaṃ aṅgamagadhānaṃ ime lābhāti attho.

[03] ^b^saṅghino^eb^tiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti ^b^saṅghino^eb^. sveva gaṇo etesaṃ atthīti ^b^gaṇino^eb^. ācārasikkhāpanavasena tassa gaṇassa ācariyāti ^b^gaṇācariyā. ñātā^eb^ti paññātā pākaṭā. yathābhuccaguṇehi ceva ayathābhūtaguṇehi ca samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti ^b^yasassino^eb^. pūraṇādīnañhi ``appiccho santuṭṭho, appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsetī''tiādinā nayena yaso samuggato, tathāgatassa ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādīhi yathābhūtaguṇehi. ^b^titthakarā^eb^ti laddhikarā. ^b^sādhusammatā^eb^ti ime sādhū sundarā sappurisāti evaṃ sammatā. ^b^bahujanassā^eb^ti assutavato ceva andhabālaputhujjanassa vibhāvino ca paṇḍitajanassa. tattha titthiyā bālajanassa evaṃ sammatā, tathāgato paṇḍitajanassa. iminā nayena ^b^pūraṇo kassapo saṅghī^eb^tiādīsu attho veditabbo. bhagavā pana yasmā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇāni vibhajanto bahūni nibbānaotaraṇatitthāni akāsi, tasmā ``titthakaro''ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03] kasmā ^a^V3.0169^ea^ panete sabbepi tattha osaṭāti? upaṭṭhākarakkhaṇatthañceva lābhasakkāratthañca. tesañhi evaṃ hoti -- ``amhākaṃ upaṭṭhākā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, te ca rakkhissāma. samaṇassa ca gotamassa upaṭṭhāke sakkāraṃ karonte disvā amhākampi upaṭṭhākā amhākaṃ ^a^P3.0237^ea^ sakkāraṃ karissantī''ti. tasmā yattha yattha bhagavā osarati, tattha tattha sabbe osaranti.

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ^b^vādaṃ āropetvā^eb^ti vāde dosaṃ āropetvā. ^b^apakkantā^eb^ti, apagatā, keci disaṃ pakkantā, keci gihibhāvaṃ pattā, keci imaṃ sāsanaṃ āgatā. ^b^sahitaṃ me^eb^ti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ, atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttanti attho. ^b^asahitaṃ te^eb^ti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ asahitaṃ. ^b^adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvatta^eb^nti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīgharattāciṇṇavasena suppaguṇaṃ, taṃ mayhaṃ ekavacaneneva viparāvattaṃ viparivattitvā ṭhitaṃ, na kiñci jātanti attho. ^b^āropito te vādo^eb^ti mayā tava vāde doso ^a^M3.0165^ea^ āropito. ^b^cara vādappamokkhāyā^eb^ti dosamocanatthaṃ cara vicara, tattha tattha gantvā sikkhāti attho. ^b^nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosī^eb^ti atha sayaṃ pahosi, idāneva nibbeṭhehi. ^b^dhammakkosenā^eb^ti sabhāvakkosena.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ no sossāmā^eb^ti taṃ amhākaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ suṇissāma. ^b^khuddamadhu^eb^nti khuddakamakkhikāhi kataṃ daṇḍakamadhuṃ. ^b^anelaka^eb^nti niddosaṃ apagatamacchikaṇḍakaṃ. ^b^pīḷeyyā^eb^ti dadeyya. ^b^paccāsīsamānarūpo^eb^ti pūretvā nu kho no bhojanaṃ dassatīti bhājanahattho paccāsīsamāno paccupaṭṭhito assa. ^b^sampayojetvā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0238^ea^ appamattakaṃ vivādaṃ katvā.
[03] 241^b^.^eb^ ^b^itarītarenā^eb^ti lāmakalāmakena. ^b^pavivitto^eb^ti idaṃ paribbājako kāyavivekamattaṃ sandhāya vadati, bhagavā pana tīhi vivekehi vivittova.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ ^b^kosakāhārāpī^eb^ti dānapatīnaṃ ghare aggabhikkhāṭhapanatthaṃ khuddakasarāvā honti, dānapatino aggabhattaṃ vā tattha ṭhapetvā bhuñjanti, pabbajite sampatte taṃ bhattaṃ tassa denti. taṃ sarāvakaṃ kosakoti vuccati. tasmā ye ca ekeneva bhattakosakena yāpenti, te kosakāhārāti. ^b^beluvāhārā^eb^ti beluvamattabhattāhārā. ^b^samatittika^eb^nti oṭṭhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhāsamaṃ ^a^V3.0170^ea^. ^b^iminā dhammenā^eb^ti iminā appāhāratādhammena. ettha pana sabbākāreneva bhagavā anappāhāroti na vattabbo. padhānabhūmiyaṃ chabbassāni appāhārova ahosi, verañjāyaṃ tayo māse patthodaneneva yāpesi pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe tayo māse bhisamuḷāleheva yāpesi. idha ^a^P3.0239^ea^ pana etamatthaṃ dasseti -- ``ahaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle appāhāro ahosiṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī''ti. tasmā yadi te iminā dhammena sakkareyyuṃ, mayā hi te visesatarā. añño ceva pana dhammo atthi, yena maṃ te sakkarontīti dasseti. iminā nayena sabbavāresu yojanā veditabbā.

[03] ^b^paṃsukūlikā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0166^ea^ samādinnapaṃsukūlikaṅgā. ^b^lūkhacīvaradharā^eb^ti satthasuttalūkhāni cīvarāni dhārayamānā. ^b^nantakānī^eb^ti antavirahitāni vatthakhaṇḍāni, yadi hi nesaṃ anto bhaveyya, pilotikāti saṅkhaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. ^b^uccinitvā^eb^ti phāletvā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya thiraṭṭhānameva gahetvā. ^b^alābulomasānī^eb^ti alābulomasadisasuttāni sukhumānīti dīpeti. ettāvatā ca satthā cīvarasantosena asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo. atimuttakasusānato hissa puṇṇadāsiyā pārupitvā pātitasāṇapaṃsukūlaṃ gahaṇadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi. idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti -- ``ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva kāle paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhiṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī''ti.

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātikā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0240^ea^ atirekalābhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnapiṇḍapātikaṅgā. ^b^sapadānacārino^eb^ti loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnasapadānacārā. ^b^uñchāsake vate ratā^eb^ti uñchācariyasaṅkhāte bhikkhūnaṃ pakativate ratā, uccanīcagharadvāraṭṭhāyino hutvā kabaramissakaṃ bhattaṃ saṃharitvā paribhuñjantīti attho. ^b^antaraghara^eb^nti brahmāyusutte ummārato paṭṭhāya antaragharaṃ, idha indakhīlato paṭṭhāya adhippetaṃ. ettāvatā ca satthā piṇḍapātasantosena asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo, appāhāratāya vuttaniyāmeneva pana sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti -- ``ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva kāle nimantanaṃ na sādayiṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī''ti.

[03] ^b^rukkhamūlikā^eb^ti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnarukkhamūlikaṅgā. ^b^abbhokāsikā^eb^ti channañca rukkhamūlañca ^a^V3.0171^ea^ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnābbhokāsikaṅgā. ^b^aṭṭhamāse^eb^ti hemantagimhike māse. antovasse pana cīvarānuggahatthaṃ channaṃ pavisanti. ettāvatā ca satthā senāsanasantosena asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo, senāsanasantoso ^a^P3.0241^ea^ panassa chabbassikamahāpadhānena ca pālileyyakavanasaṇḍena ca dīpetabbo. idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti -- ``ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva kāle channaṃ na pāvisiṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī''ti.

[03] ^b^āraññikā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0167^ea^ gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnāaraññikaṅgā. ^b^saṅghamajjhe osarantī^eb^ti abaddhasīmāya kathitaṃ, baddhasīmāyaṃ pana vasantā attano vasanaṭṭhāneyeva uposathaṃ karonti. ettāvatā ca satthā no pavivittoti na vattabbo, ``icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisalliyitu''nti (pārā0 162; 565) evañhissa paviveko paññāyati. idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti ``ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva tathārūpe kāle paṭisalliyiṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī''ti. ^b^mamaṃ sāvakā^eb^ti maṃ sāvakā.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ^b^sanidāna^eb^nti sappaccayaṃ. kiṃ pana appaccayaṃ nibbānaṃ na desetīti. no na deseti, sahetukaṃ pana taṃ desanaṃ katvā deseti, no ahetukanti. ^b^sappāṭihāriya^eb^nti purimassevetaṃ vevacanaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. ^b^taṃ vatā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vatā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ ^b^anāgataṃ vādapatha^eb^nti ajja ṭhapetvā sve vā punadivase vā aḍḍhamāse vā māse vā saṃvacchare vā tassa tassa pañhassa upari āgamanavādapathaṃ. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P3.0242^ea^ ^b^dakkhatī^eb^ti yathā saccako nigaṇṭho attano niggahaṇatthaṃ āgatakāraṇaṃ visesetvā vadanto na addasa, evaṃ na dakkhatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. ^b^sahadhammenā^eb^ti sakāraṇena. ^b^antarantarā kathaṃ opāteyyu^eb^nti mama kathāvāraṃ pacchinditvā antarantare attano kathaṃ paveseyyunti attho. ^b^na kho panāhaṃ, udāyī^eb^ti, udāyi, ahaṃ ambaṭṭhasoṇadaṇḍakūṭadantasaccakanigaṇṭhādīhi saddhiṃ mahāvāde vattamānepi -- ``aho vata me ekasāvakopi upamaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā āharitvā dadeyyā''ti evaṃ sāvakesu anusāsaniṃ na paccāsīsāmi. ^b^mamayevā^eb^ti evarūpesu ṭhānesu sāvakā mamayeva anusāsaniṃ ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0172^ea^ ^b^cittaṃ ārādhemī^eb^ti tesaṃ ahaṃ tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ gaṇhāmi sampādemi paripūremi, aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ na byākaromi, ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ viya labujaṃ vā puṭṭho ambaṃ viya. ettha ca ``adhisīle sambhāventī''ti vuttaṭṭhāne buddhasīlaṃ nāma kathitaṃ, ``abhikkante ñāṇadassane ^a^M3.0168^ea^ sambhāventī''ti vuttaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, ``adhipaññāya sambhāventī''ti vuttaṭṭhāne ṭhānuppattikapaññā, ``yena dukkhenā''ti vuttaṭṭhāne saccabyākaraṇapaññā. tattha sabbaññutaññāṇañca saccabyākaraṇapaññañca ṭhapetvā ^a^P3.0243^ea^ avasesā paññā adhipaññaṃ bhajati.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ paṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto ^b^puna caparaṃ udāyī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^abhiññāvosānapāramippattā^eb^ti abhiññāvosānasaṅkhātañceva abhiññāpāramīsaṅkhātañca arahattaṃ pattā.

[03] ^b^sammappadhāne^eb^ti upāyapadhāne. ^b^chandaṃ janetī^eb^ti kattukamyatākusalacchandaṃ janeti. ^b^vāyamatī^eb^ti vāyāmaṃ karoti. ^b^vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti vīriyaṃ pavatteti. ^b^cittaṃ paggaṇhātī^eb^ti cittaṃ ukkhipati. ^b^padahatī^eb^ti upāyapadhānaṃ karoti. ^b^bhāvanāya pāripūriyā^eb^ti vaḍḍhiyā paripūraṇatthaṃ. apicettha -- ``yā ṭhiti, so asammoso...pe0... yaṃ vepullaṃ, sā bhāvanāpāripūrī''ti (vibha0 406) evaṃ purimaṃ purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimassa atthotipi veditabbaṃ.
[03] imehi pana sammappadhānehi kiṃ kathitaṃ? kassapasaṃyuttapariyāyena sāvakassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā. vuttañhetaṃ tattha --

[03] ``cattārome ^a^P3.0244^ea^, āvuso, sammappadhānā. katame cattāro? idhāvuso, bhikkhu, anuppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti. uppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti. anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti. uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karotī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.145).

[03] ettha ^a^V3.0173^ea^ ca pāpakā akusalāti lobhādayo veditabbā. anuppannā kusalā dhammāti samathavipassanā ceva maggo ca, uppannā kusalā nāma samathavipassanāva. maggo pana sakiṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvattanako ^a^M3.0169^ea^ nāma natthi. so hi phalassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati. purimasmimpi vā samathavipassanāva gahetabbāti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana na yuttaṃ.
