[03] ^b^tiṇarukkhe^eb^ti anupādinnakajātiṃ katvā pacchā upādinnakajātiṃ kathessāmi, evaṃ tassa jātibhedo pākaṭo bhavissatīti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. mahāsīvatthero pana ``kiṃ, bhante, anupādinnakaṃ bījanānatāya nānaṃ, upādinnaṃ kammanānatāyāti? evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭatī''ti pucchito āma na vaṭṭati. kammañhi yoniyaṃ khipati. yonisiddhā ime sattā nānāvaṇṇā hontīti. ^b^tiṇarukkhe^eb^ti ettha antopheggū bahisārā antamaso tālanāḷikerādayopi tiṇāneva, antosārā pana bahipheggū sabbe rukkhā nāma. ^b^na cāpi paṭijānare^eb^ti mayaṃ tiṇā mayaṃ rukkhāti vā, ahaṃ tiṇaṃ, ahaṃ rukkhoti vā evaṃ na jānanti. ^b^liṅgaṃ jātimaya^eb^nti ajānantānampi ca tesaṃ jātimayameva saṇṭhānaṃ attano mūlabhūtatiṇādisadisameva hoti. kiṃ kāraṇā? ^b^aññamaññā hi jātiyo^eb^. yasmā aññā tiṇajāti, aññā rukkhajāti. tiṇesupi aññā tālajāti, aññā nāḷikerajāti, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. iminā idaṃ dasseti -- yaṃ jātivasena nānā ^a^M3.0296^ea^ hoti, taṃ attano paṭiññaṃ paresaṃ vā upadesaṃ vināpi aññajātito visesena gayhati. yadi ca jātiyā brāhmaṇo ^a^P3.0434^ea^ bhaveyya, sopi attano paṭiññaṃ paresaṃ vā upadesaṃ vinā khattiyato vessato suddato vā visesena gayheyya, na ca gayhati. tasmā na jātiyā brāhmaṇoti. parato pana ``yathā etāsu jātīsū''ti gāthāya etamatthaṃ vacībhedeneva āvikarissati.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V3.0305^ea^ anupādinnakesu jātiṃ dassetvā upādinnakesu dassento ^b^tato kīṭe^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^yāva kunthakipillike^eb^ti kunthakipillikaṃ pariyantaṃ katvāti attho. ettha ca ye uppatitvā gacchanti, te paṭaṅgā nāma. ^b^aññamaññā hi jātiyo^eb^ti tesampi nīlarattādivaṇṇavasena jātiyo nānappakārāva honti.
[03] ^b^khuddake^eb^ti kāḷakādayo. ^b^mahallake^eb^ti sasabiḷārādayo.
[03] ^b^pādūdare^eb^ti udarapāde, udaraṃyeva nesaṃ pādāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^dīghapiṭṭhike^eb^ti sappānañhi sīsato yāva naṅguṭṭhā piṭṭhiyeva hoti, tena te ``dīghapiṭṭhikā''ti vuccanti.
[03] ^b^udake^eb^ti odake, udakamhi jāte.
[03] ^b^pakkhī^eb^ti sakuṇe. te hi pattehi yantīti ^b^pattayānā,^eb^ vehāsaṃ gacchantīti ^b^vihaṅgamā^eb^.

[03] evaṃ thalajalākāsagocarānaṃ pāṇānaṃ jātibhedaṃ dassetvā idāni yenādhippāyena taṃ dasseti, taṃ āvikaronto yathā etāsūti gāthamāha. tassattho saṅkhepena vuttova. vitthārato panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^a^P3.0435^ea^ sayameva dassento ^b^na kesehī^eb^tiādimāha. tatrāyaṃ yojanā -- yaṃ vuttaṃ ``natthi manussesu liṅgajātimayaṃ puthū''ti, taṃ evaṃ natthīti veditabbaṃ. seyyathidaṃ? ^b^na kesehī^eb^ti. na hi -- ``brāhmaṇānaṃ edisā kesā honti, khattiyānaṃ edisā''ti niyamo atthi yathā hatthiassamigādīnanti iminā nayena sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^liṅgaṃ jātimayaṃ neva, yathā aññāsu jātisū^eb^ti idaṃ pana vuttassevatthassa nigamananti veditabbaṃ. tassāyaṃ yojanā -- evaṃ yasmā imehi ^a^M3.0297^ea^ kesādīhi natthi manussesu liṅgaṃ jātimayaṃ puthu, tasmā veditabbametaṃ ``brāhmaṇādibhedesu manussesu liṅgaṃ jātimayaṃ neva, yathā aññāsu jātisū''ti.

[03] 457^b^.^eb^ idāni evaṃ jātibhede asatipi ``brāhmaṇo khattiyo''ti idaṃ nānattaṃ yathā jātaṃ ^a^V3.0306^ea^, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^paccatta^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^vokāra^eb^nti nānattaṃ. ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho -- yathā hi tiracchānānaṃ yonisiddhameva kesādisaṇṭhānena nānattaṃ, tathā brāhmaṇādīnaṃ attano attano sarīre taṃ natthi. evaṃ santepi yadetaṃ ``brāhmaṇo khattiyo''ti vokāraṃ, taṃ vokārañca manussesu samaññāya pavuccati, vohāramatteneva pavuccatīti.

[03] ettāvatā bhagavā bhāradvājassa vādaṃ niggaṇhitvā idāni yadi jātiyā brāhmaṇo bhaveyya, ājīvasīlācāravipannopi brāhmaṇo bhaveyya. yasmā pana porāṇā brāhmaṇā tassa brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ na icchanti, loke ca aññepi paṇḍitamanussā, tasmā vāseṭṭhassa vādaṃ paggaṇhanto ^b^yo hi koci manussesū^eb^ti aṭṭha gāthā āha. tattha ^b^gorakkha^eb^nti khettarakkhaṃ, kasikammanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^go^eb^ti hi pathaviyā nāmaṃ, tasmā evamāha. ^b^puthusippenā^eb^ti tantavāyakammādinānāsippena. ^b^vohāra^eb^nti vaṇijjaṃ. ^b^parapessenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0436^ea^ paresaṃ veyyāvaccakammena. ^b^issattha^eb^nti āvudhajīvikaṃ, usuñca sattiṃ cāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^porohiccenā^eb^ti purohitakammena.

[03] evaṃ brāhmaṇasamayena ca lokavohārena ca ājīvasīlācāravipannassa abrāhmaṇabhāvaṃ sādhetvā evaṃ sante na jātiyā brāhmaṇo, guṇehi pana brāhmaṇo hoti. tasmā yattha katthaci kule jāto yo guṇavā, so brāhmaṇo, ayamettha ñāyoti evametaṃ ñāyaṃ atthato āpādetvā idāni naṃ vacībhedena pakāsento ^b^na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇa^eb^ntiādimāha. tassattho -- ahañhi yvāyaṃ catunnaṃ yonīnaṃ yattha katthaci jāto, tatrāpi visesena yo brāhmaṇassa saṃvaṇṇitāya mātari sambhūto, taṃ ^b^yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ,^eb^ yā cāyaṃ ubhato sujātotiādinā nayena brāhmaṇehi brāhmaṇassa parisuddhauppattimaggasaṅkhātā yoni vuttā, saṃsuddhagahaṇikoti iminā ^a^M3.0298^ea^ ca mātisampatti, tatopi jātasambhūtattā yonijo mattisambhavoti vuccati, taṃ ^b^yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ^eb^ iminā ca yonijamattisambhavamattena na brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi. kasmā? yasmā, bho bhoti, vacanamattena aññehi sakiñcanehi visiṭṭhattā ^b^bhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano^eb^ sapalibodho. yo panāyaṃ yattha katthaci jātopi rāgādikiñcanābhāvena akiñcano, sabbagahaṇapaṭinissaggena anādāno, ^b^akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi^eb^ ^a^P3.0437^ea^ ^b^brāhmaṇaṃ.^eb^ kasmā? yasmā bāhitapāpoti.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ kiñcabhiyyo ^a^V3.0307^ea^ sabbasaṃyojanaṃ chetvātiādi sattavīsati gāthā. tattha ^b^sabbasaṃyojana^eb^nti dasavidhasaṃyojanaṃ. ^b^na paritassatī^eb^ti taṇhāparitassanāya na paritassati. ^b^saṅgātiga^eb^nti rāgasaṅgādayo atikkantaṃ. ^b^visaṃyutta^eb^nti catūhi yonīhi sabbakilesehi vā visaṃyuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^naddhi^eb^nti upanāhaṃ. ^b^varatta^eb^nti taṇhaṃ. ^b^sandāna^eb^nti yuttapāsaṃ, diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^sahanukkama^eb^nti anukkamo vuccati pāse pavesanagaṇṭhi, diṭṭhānusayassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^ukkhittapaligha^eb^nti ettha palighoti avijjā. ^b^buddha^eb^nti catusaccabuddhaṃ. ^b^titikkhatī^eb^ti khamati.
[03] ^b^khantibala^eb^nti adhivāsanakhantibalaṃ. sā pana sakiṃ uppannā balānīkaṃ nāma na hoti, punappunaṃ uppannā pana hoti. tassā atthitāya ^b^balānīkaṃ^eb^.
[03] ^b^vatavanta^eb^nti dhutaṅgavantaṃ. ^b^sīlavanta^eb^nti guṇavantaṃ. ^b^anussada^eb^nti rāgādiussadavirahitaṃ. ``anussuta''ntipi pāṭho, anavassutanti attho. ^b^danta^eb^nti nibbisevanaṃ.
[03] ^b^na limpatī^eb^ti na allīyati. ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti kilesakāmavatthukāmesu.

[03] ^b^dukkhassa^eb^ ^a^P3.0438^ea^ ^b^pajānāti, idheva khaya^eb^nti ettha arahattaphalaṃ dukkhakkhayoti adhippetaṃ.^b^ pajānātī^eb^ti adhigamavasena jānāti.^b^ pannabhāra^eb^nti ohitabhāraṃ, khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārakāmaguṇabhāre otāretvā ṭhitaṃ. visaṃyuttapadaṃ vuttatthameva.
[03] ^b^gambhīrapañña^eb^nti gambhīresu ārammaṇesu pavattapaññaṃ. ^b^medhāvi^eb^nti pakatipaññāya paññavantaṃ.

[03] ^b^anāgārehi^eb^ ^a^M3.0299^ea^ ^b^cūbhaya^eb^nti anāgārehi ca visaṃsaṭṭhaṃ ubhayañca, dvīhipi cetehi visaṃsaṭṭhamevāti attho. ^b^anokasāri^eb^nti okaṃ vuccati pañcakāmaguṇālayo, taṃ anallīyamānanti attho. ^b^appiccha^eb^nti anicchaṃ.
[03] ^b^tasesū^eb^ti ^a^V3.0308^ea^ sataṇhesu. ^b^thāvaresū^eb^ti nittaṇhesu.
[03] ^b^attadaṇḍesū^eb^ti gahitadaṇḍesu. ^b^nibbuta^eb^nti kilesanibbānena nibbutaṃ. ^b^sādānesū^eb^ti saupādānesu.
[03] ^b^ohito^eb^ti patito.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ ^b^akakkasa^eb^nti niddosaṃ. sadoso hi rukkhopi sakakkasoti vuccati. ^b^viññāpani^eb^nti atthaviññāpanikaṃ. ^b^sacca^eb^nti avisaṃvādikaṃ. ^b^udīraye^eb^ti bhaṇati. ^b^yāya^eb^ ^a^P3.0439^ea^ ^b^nābhisajje^eb^ti yāya girāya parassa sajjanaṃ vā lagganaṃ vā na karoti, tādisaṃ apharusaṃ giraṃ bhāsatīti attho.

[03] ^b^dīgha^eb^nti suttāruḷhabhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^rassa^eb^nti vippakiṇṇabhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^aṇu^eb^nti khuddakaṃ. ^b^thūla^eb^nti mahantaṃ. ^b^subhāsubha^eb^nti sundarāsundaraṃ. dīghabhaṇḍañhi appagghampi hoti mahagghampi. rassādīsupi eseva nayo. iti ettāvatā na sabbaṃ pariyādiṇṇaṃ, ``subhāsubha''nti iminā pana pariyādiṇṇaṃ hoti.
[03] ^b^nirāsaya^eb^nti nittaṇhaṃ.
[03] ^b^ālayā^eb^ti taṇhālayā. ^b^aññāyā^eb^ti jānitvā. ^b^amatogadha^eb^nti amatabbhantaraṃ. ^b^anuppatta^eb^nti anupaviṭṭhaṃ.
[03] ^b^ubho saṅga^eb^nti ubhayampetaṃ saṅgaṃ. puññañhi sagge laggāpeti, apuññaṃ apāye, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ saṅganti āha. ^b^upaccagā^eb^ti atīto.
[03] ^b^anāvila^eb^nti āvilakaraṇakilesavirahitaṃ. ^b^nandībhavaparikkhīṇa^eb^nti parikkhīṇanandiṃ parikkhīṇabhavaṃ.

[03] ``yo ^a^V3.0309^ea^ ima''nti gāthāya avijjāyeva visaṃvādakaṭṭhena ^b^palipatho,^eb^ mahāviduggatāya ^b^duggaṃ,^eb^ saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^saṃsāro,^eb^ mohanaṭṭhena ^b^moho^eb^ti vutto. ^b^tiṇṇo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0440^ea^ caturoghatiṇṇo. ^b^pāraṅgato^eb^ti nibbānaṃ gato. ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena jhāyī. ^b^anejo^eb^ti nittaṇho. ^b^anupādāya^eb^ ^a^M3.0300^ea^ ^b^nibbuto^eb^ti kiñci gahaṇaṃ aggahetvā sabbakilesanibbānena nibbuto.
[03] ^b^kāme^eb^ti duvidhepi kāme. ^b^anāgāro^eb^ti anāgāro hutvā. ^b^paribbaje^eb^ti paribbajati. ^b^kāmabhavaparikkhīṇa^eb^nti khīṇakāmaṃ khīṇabhavaṃ.
[03] ^b^mānusakaṃ yoga^eb^nti mānusakaṃ pañcakāmaguṇayogaṃ. ^b^dibbaṃ yoga^eb^nti dibbaṃ pañcakāmaguṇayogaṃ. ^b^sabbayogavisaṃyutta^eb^nti sabbakilesayogavisaṃyuttaṃ.
[03] ^b^rati^eb^nti pañcakāmaguṇaratiṃ. ^b^arati^eb^nti kusalabhāvanāya ukkaṇṭhitaṃ. ^b^vīra^eb^nti vīriyavantaṃ.
[03] ^b^sugata^eb^nti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gataṃ, sundarāya vā paṭipattiyā gataṃ.
[03] ^b^gati^eb^nti nibbattiṃ. ^b^pure^eb^ti atīte. ^b^pacchā^eb^ti anāgate. ^b^majjhe^eb^ti paccuppanne. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti ^a^P3.0441^ea^ kiñcanakārako kileso.
[03] ^b^mahesi^eb^nti mahante guṇe pariyesanaṭṭhena mahesiṃ. ^b^vijitāvina^eb^nti vijitavijayaṃ.

[03] 460^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavā guṇato khīṇāsavaṃyeva brāhmaṇaṃ dassetvā ye jātito brāhmaṇoti abhinivesaṃ karonti, te idaṃ ajānantā, sāva nesaṃ diṭṭhi duddiṭṭhīti dassento ^b^samaññā hesā^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tassattho -- yadidaṃ brāhmaṇo khattiyo bhāradvājo vāseṭṭhoti nāmagottaṃ pakappitaṃ kataṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ, samaññā hesā lokasmiṃ, vohāramattanti attho. kasmā? yasmā ^b^samuccā samudāgataṃ^eb^ samaññāya āgataṃ. etañhi tattha tattha jātakāleyevassa ñātisālohitehi pakappitaṃ kataṃ. no ce naṃ evaṃ pakappeyyuṃ, na koci kiñci disvā ayaṃ brāhmaṇoti vā bhāradvājoti ^a^V3.0310^ea^ vā jāneyya. evaṃ pakappitaṃ petaṃ ^b^dīgharattānusayitaṃ, diṭṭhigatamajānataṃ,^eb^ taṃ pakappitaṃ nāmagottaṃ ``nāmagottamattametaṃ, vohāratthaṃ pakappita''nti, ajānantānaṃ sattānaṃ hadaye dīgharattaṃ diṭṭhigatamanusayitaṃ. tassa anusayitattā taṃ nāmagottaṃ ^b^ajānantā no pabrunti,^eb^ ``jātiyā hoti brāhmaṇo''ti ajānantāva evaṃ vadantīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M3.0301^ea^ ``ye `jātito brāhmaṇo'ti abhinivesaṃ karonti, te idaṃ vohāramattaṃ ajānantā, sāva nesaṃ diṭṭhi duddiṭṭhī''ti dassetvā idāni nippariyāyameva jātivādaṃ paṭikkhipanto kammavādañca patiṭṭhapento ^b^na jaccā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ``kammunā''ti upaḍḍhagāthāya vitthāraṇatthaṃ ^b^kassako kammunā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kammunā^eb^ti paccuppannena kasikammādinibbattakacetanākammunā.

[03] ^b^paṭiccasamuppādadassā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0442^ea^ iminā paccayena evaṃ hotīti evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādadassāvino. ^b^kammavipākakovidā^eb^ti sammānāvamānārahakule kammavasena uppatti hoti, aññāpi hīnapaṇītatā hīnapaṇīte kamme vipaccamāne hotīti. evaṃ kammavipākakusalā.

[03] ^b^kammunā vattatī^eb^ti gāthāya pana lokoti vā pajāti vā sattoti vā ekoyevattho, vacanamattabhedo. purimapadena cettha ``atthi brahmā mahābrahmā seṭṭho sajitā''ti diṭṭhiyā paṭisedho veditabbo. kammunā hi tāsu tāsu gatīsu vattati loko, tassa ko sajitāti. dutiyapadena ``evaṃ kammunā nibbattopi ca pavattepi atītapaccuppannabhedena kammunā vattati, sukhadukkhāni paccanubhonto hīnapaṇītādibhedañca āpajjanto pavattatī''ti dasseti. tatiyena tamevatthaṃ nigameti ``evaṃ sabbathāpi kammanibandhanā sattā kammeneva baddhā hutvā pavattanti, na aññathā''ti. catutthena tametthaṃ upamāya vibhāveti. yathā hi rathassa yāyato āṇi nibandhanaṃ hoti, na tāya anibaddho yāti, evaṃ lokassa nibbattato ca pavattato ca kammaṃ nibandhanaṃ, na tena anibaddho nibbattati na pavattati.

[03] idāni yasmā ^a^P3.0443^ea^ evaṃ kammanibandhano loko, tasmā seṭṭhena kammunā seṭṭhabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^tapenā^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^tapenā^eb^ti dhutaṅgatapena. ^b^brahmacariyenā^eb^ti methunaviratiyā. ^b^saṃyamenā^eb^ti sīlena ^a^V3.0311^ea^. ^b^damenā^eb^ti indriyadamena. ^b^etenā^eb^ti etena seṭṭhena parisuddhena brahmabhūtena kammunā brāhmaṇo hoti. kasmā? yasmā ^b^etaṃ brāhmaṇamuttamaṃ,^eb^ yasmā etaṃ kammaṃ uttamo brāhmaṇaguṇoti vuttaṃ hoti. ``brahmāna''ntipi pāṭho. ayaṃ panettha vacanattho -- brahmaṃ ānetīti brahmānaṃ, brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ āvahatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] dutiyagāthāya ^a^M3.0302^ea^ ^b^santo^eb^ti santakileso. ^b^brahmā sakko^eb^ti brahmā ca sakko ca, yo evarūpo, so na kevalaṃ brāhmaṇo, atha kho brahmā ca sakko ca so vijānataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ, evaṃ vāseṭṭha, jānāhīti vuttaṃ hoti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] vāseṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 462^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0312^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti subhasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^todeyyaputto^eb^ti tudigāmavāsino todeyyabrāhmaṇassa putto. ^b^ārādhako hotī^eb^ti sampādako hoti paripūrako. ^b^ñāyaṃ dhamma^eb^nti kāraṇadhammaṃ. ^b^kusala^eb^nti anavajjaṃ.
[03] 463^b^.^eb^ ^b^micchāpaṭipatti^eb^nti ^a^P3.0444^ea^ aniyyānikaṃ akusalapaṭipadaṃ. ^b^sammāpaṭipatti^eb^nti niyyānikaṃ kusalapaṭipadaṃ.

[03] ^b^mahaṭṭha^eb^ntiādīsu mahantehi veyyāvaccakarehi vā upakaraṇehi vā bahūhi attho etthāti ^b^mahaṭṭhaṃ^eb^. mahantāni nāmaggahaṇamaṅgalādīni kiccāni etthāti ^b^mahākiccaṃ^eb^. idaṃ ajja kattabbaṃ, idaṃ sveti evaṃ mahantāni adhikārasaṅkhātāni adhikaraṇāni etthāti ^b^mahādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^. bahūnaṃ kamme yuttappayuttatāvasena pīḷāsaṅkhāto mahāsamārambho etthāti ^b^mahāsamārambhaṃ. gharāvāsakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti gharāvāsakammaṃ. evaṃ sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. kasikamme cettha naṅgalakoṭiṃ ādiṃ katvā upakaraṇānaṃ pariyesanavasena mahaṭṭhatā, vaṇijjāya yathāṭhitaṃyeva bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā parivattanavasena appaṭṭhatā veditabbā. ^b^vipajjamāna^eb^nti avuṭṭhiativuṭṭhiādīhi kasikammaṃ, maṇisuvaṇṇādīsu acchekatādīhi ca vaṇijjakammaṃ appaphalaṃ hoti, mūlacchedampi pāpuṇāti. vipariyāyena sampajjamānaṃ mahapphalaṃ cūḷantevāsikassa viya.

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti yathā kasikammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjamānaṃ appaphalaṃ hoti, evaṃ gharāvāsakammaṭṭhānampi. akatakalyāṇo hi kālaṃ katvā niraye ^a^M3.0303^ea^ nibbattati. mahādattasenāpati nāma kireko brāhmaṇabhatto ahosi, tassa maraṇasamaye nirayo upaṭṭhāsi. so brāhmaṇehi ``kiṃ passasī''ti vutto? lohitagharanti āha. brahmaloko bho esoti. brahmaloko nāma bho kahanti? uparīti. mayhaṃ heṭṭhā upaṭṭhātīti. kiñcāpi heṭṭhā upaṭṭhāti ^a^P3.0445^ea^, tathāpi uparīti kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto. ``iminā amhākaṃ yaññe doso dinno''ti sahassaṃ gahetvā ^a^V3.0313^ea^ nīharituṃ adaṃsu. sampajjamānaṃ pana mahapphalaṃ hoti. katakalyāṇo hi kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbattati. sakalāya guttilavimānakathāya dīpetabbaṃ. yathā pana taṃ vaṇijjakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjamānaṃ appaphalaṃ hoti, evaṃ sīlesu aparipūrakārino anesanāya yuttassa pabbajjākammaṭṭhānampi. evarūpā hi neva jhānādisukhaṃ na saggamokkhaṃ labhati. sampajjamānaṃ pana mahapphalaṃ hoti. sīlāni hi pūretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento arahattampi pāpuṇāti.

[03] ^b^brāhmaṇā, bho gotamo^eb^ti idha kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati? brāhmaṇā vadanti -- ``pabbajito ime pañca dhamme pūretuṃ samattho nāma natthi, gahaṭṭhova pūretī''ti. samaṇo pana gotamo -- ``gihissa vā ahaṃ māṇava pabbajitassa vā''ti punappunaṃ vadati, neva pabbajitaṃ muñcati, mayhameva pucchaṃ maññe na sallakkhetīti cāgasīsena pañca dhamme pucchāmīti pucchati. ^b^sace te agarū^eb^ti sace tuyhaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā paññapenti, tathā idha bhāsituṃ bhāriyaṃ na hoti, yadi na koci aphāsukabhāvo hoti, bhāsassūti attho. ^b^na kho me, bho^eb^ti kiṃ sandhāyāha? paṇḍitapaṭirūpakānañhi santike kathetuṃ dukkhaṃ hoti, te pade pade akkhare akkhare dosameva vadanti. ekantapaṇḍitā pana kathaṃ sutvā sukathitaṃ pasaṃsanti, dukkathite pāḷipadātthabyañjanesu ^a^P3.0446^ea^ yaṃ yaṃ virujjhati, taṃ taṃ ujuṃ katvā denti. bhagavatā ca sadiso ekantapaṇḍito nāma natthi, tenāha ``na kho me, bho gotama, garu, yatthassu bhavanto vā nisinno bhavantarūpo vā''ti. ^b^sacca^eb^nti vacīsaccaṃ. ^b^tapa^eb^nti tapacariyaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti methunaviratiṃ. ^b^ajjhena^eb^nti mantagahaṇaṃ. ^b^cāga^eb^nti āmisapariccāgaṃ.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ ^b^pāpito bhavissatī^eb^ti. ajānanabhāvaṃ pāpito bhavissati. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti bhagavatā andhaveṇūpamāya niggahito taṃ paccāharituṃ asakkonto yathā nāma dubbalasunakho migaṃ uṭṭhapetvā sāmikassa abhimukhaṃ ^a^M3.0304^ea^ katvā sayaṃ apasakkati, evamevaṃ ācariyaṃ apadisanto evaṃ ``brāhmaṇo''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha ^b^pokkharasātī^eb^ti idaṃ tassa nāmaṃ, ``pokkharasāyī''tipi vuccati. tassa kira kāyo setapokkharasadiso devanagare ussāpitarajatatoraṇaṃ viya sobhati, sīsaṃ panassa kāḷavaṇṇaindanīlamayaṃ viya, massupi candamaṇḍale kāḷamegharāji viya khāyati, akkhīni nīluppalasadisāni, nāsā rajatapanāḷikā viya suvaṭṭitā suparisuddhā, hatthapādatalāni ceva mukhañca katalākhārasaparikammaṃ ^a^V3.0314^ea^ viya sobhati. ativiya sobhaggappatto brāhmaṇassa attabhāvo. arājake ṭhāne rājānaṃ kātuṃ yuttamimaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ, evamesa sassiriko, iti naṃ pokkharasadisattā ``pokkharasātī''ti ^a^P3.0447^ea^ sañjānanti, pokkhare pana so nibbatto, na mātukucchiyanti iti naṃ pokkhare sayitattā ``pokkharasāyī''tipi sañjānanti. ^b^opamañño^eb^ti upamaññagotto. ^b^subhagavaniko^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhāya subhagavanassa issaro. ^b^hassakaṃyevā^eb^ti hasitabbakaññeva. ^b^nāmakaṃyevā^eb^ti lāmakaṃyeva. tadeva taṃ atthābhāvena ^b^rittakaṃ^eb^. rittakattā ca ^b^tucchakaṃ^eb^. idāni naṃ bhagavā sācariyakaṃ niggaṇhituṃ ^b^kiṃ pana māṇavā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^katamā nesaṃ seyyo^eb^ti katamā vācā tesaṃ seyyo, pāsaṃsataroti attho. ^b^sammuccā^eb^ti sammutiyā lokavohārena. ^b^mantā^eb^ti tulayitvā pariggaṇhitvā. ^b^paṭisaṅkhāyā^eb^ti jānitvā. ^b^atthasaṃhita^eb^nti kāraṇanissitaṃ. ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^ti lokavohāraṃ amuñcitvā tulayitvā jānitvā kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā kathitāya seyyabhāve sati. ^b^āvuto^eb^ti āvarito. ^b^nivuto^eb^ti nivārito. ^b^ophuṭo^eb^ti onaddho. ^b^pariyonaddho^eb^ti paliveṭhito.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ ^b^gadhito^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva. ^b^sace taṃ, bho gotama, ṭhāna^eb^nti sace etaṃ kāraṇamatthi. ^b^svāssā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0448^ea^ dhūmachārikādīnaṃ abhāvena so assa aggi accimā ca vaṇṇimā ca pabhassaro cāti. ^b^tathūpamāhaṃ māṇavā^eb^ti tappaṭibhāgaṃ ahaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yatheva hi tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṃ paṭicca jalamāno aggi dhūmachārikaṅgārānaṃ atthitāya sadoso hoti ^a^M3.0305^ea^, evamevaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppannā pīti jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokādīnaṃ atthitāya sadosā. yathā pana pariccattatiṇakaṭṭhupādāno dhūmādīnaṃ abhāvena parisuddho, evamevaṃ lokuttarajjhānadvayasampayuttā pīti jātiādīnaṃ abhāvena parisuddhāti attho.

[03] 469^b^.^eb^ idāni ye te brāhmaṇehi cāgasīsena pañca dhammā paññattā, tepi yasmā pañceva hutvā na niccalā tiṭṭhanti, anukampājātikena saddhiṃ cha āpajjanti. tasmā taṃ dosaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^ye te māṇavā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^anukampājātika^eb^nti anukampāsabhāvaṃ.

[03] ^b^kattha bahulaṃ samanupassasī^eb^ti idaṃ bhagavā yasmā -- ``esa ime pañca dhamme pabbajito paripūretuṃ ^a^V3.0315^ea^ samattho nāma natthi, gahaṭṭho paripūretī''ti āha, tasmā -- ``pabbajitova ime pūreti, gahaṭṭho pūretuṃ samattho nāma natthī''ti teneva mukhena bhaṇāpetuṃ pucchati.

[03] ^b^na satataṃ samitaṃ saccavādī^eb^tiādīsu gahaṭṭho aññasmiṃ asati vaḷañjanakamusāvādampi karotiyeva, pabbajitā asinā sīse chijjantepi dve kathā na kathenti. gahaṭṭho ca antotemāsamattampi sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti, pabbajito niccameva tapassī sīlavā tapanissitako hoti. gahaṭṭho māsassa aṭṭhadivasamattampi uposathakammaṃ ^a^P3.0449^ea^ kātuṃ na sakkoti, pabbajitā yāvajīvaṃ brahmacārino honti. gahaṭṭho ratanasuttamaṅgalasuttamattampi potthake likhitvā ṭhapeti, pabbajitā niccaṃ sajjhāyanti. gahaṭṭho salākabhattampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā dātuṃ na sakkoti, pabbajitā aññasmiṃ asati kākasunakhādīnampi piṇḍaṃ denti, bhaṇḍaggāhakadaharassapi patte pakkhipantevāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^cittassāhamete^eb^nti ahaṃ ete pañca dhamme mettacittassa parivāre vadāmīti attho.

[03] 470^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātavaddho^eb^ti jāto ca vaḍḍhito ca. yo hi kevalaṃ tattha jātova hoti, aññattha vaḍḍhito, tassa samantā gāmamaggā na sabbaso paccakkhā honti, tasmā jātavaddhoti āha. jātavaddhopi hi yo ciraṃ nikkhanto, tassa na sabbaso paccakkhā honti, tasmā ^b^tāvadeva avasaṭa^eb^nti āha, taṃkhaṇameva nikkhantanti attho. ^b^dandhāyitatta^eb^nti ``ayaṃ ^a^M3.0306^ea^ nu kho maggo ayaṃ na nu kho''ti kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitattaṃ. ^b^vitthāyitatta^eb^nti yathā sukhumaṃ atthajātaṃ sahasā pucchitassa kassaci sarīraṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ gaṇhāti, evaṃ thaddhabhāvagahaṇaṃ. ^b^natvevā^eb^ti iminā sabbaññutaññāṇassa appaṭihatabhāvaṃ dasseti. tassa hi purisassa mārāvaṭṭanādīnaṃ vasena siyā ñāṇassa paṭighāto, tena so dandhāyeyya vā vitthāyeyya vā, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana appaṭihataṃ, na sakkā tassa kenaci antarāyo kātunti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^seyyathāpi māṇava balavā saṅkhadhamo^eb^ti ettha ^a^P3.0450^ea^ ^b^balavā^eb^ti balasampanno. ^b^saṅkhadhamo^eb^ti saṅkhadhamako. ^b^appakasirenā^eb^ti akicchena adukkhena. dubbalo hi saṅkhadhamako saṅkhaṃ dhamantopi na sakkoti catasso disā sarena viññāpetuṃ, nāssa saṅkhasaddo sabbaso phari. balavato pana vipphāriko hoti, tasmā balavāti āha. ^b^mettāya cetovimuttiyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^mettāyā^eb^ti vutte upacāropi ^a^V3.0316^ea^ appanāpi vaṭṭati, ^b^cetovimuttiyā^eb^ti vutte pana appanāva vaṭṭati. ^b^yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kamma^eb^nti pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ vuccati, appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacaraṃ. tesupi idha brahmavihārakammaññeva adhippetaṃ. tañhi pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odhisakānodhisaka disāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetvā katattā appamāṇakatanti vuccati. ^b^na taṃ tatrāvasissati, na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatī^eb^ti taṃ kāmāvacarakammaṃ tasmiṃ rūpārūpāvacarakamme na ohīyati na tiṭṭhati. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? kāmāvacarakammaṃ tassa rūpārūpāvacarakammassa antarā laggituṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā rūpārūpāvacarakammaṃ pharitvā pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā patiṭṭhātuṃ vā na sakkoti, atha kho rūpārūpāvacarakammameva kāmāvacaraṃ mahogho viya parittaudakaṃ pharitvā pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati, tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayameva brahmasahabyataṃ upanetīti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] subhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0317^ea^ ^a^P3.0451^ea^ ^a^M3.0307^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti saṅgāravasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^cañcalikappe^eb^ti evaṃnāmake gāme. ^b^abhippasannā^eb^ti aveccappasādavasena pasannā. sā kira sotāpannā ariyasāvikā bhāradvājagottassa brāhmaṇassa bhariyā. so brāhmaṇo pubbe kālena kālaṃ brāhmaṇe nimantetvā tesaṃ sakkāraṃ karoti. imaṃ pana brāhmaṇiṃ gharaṃ ānetvā abhirūpāya mahākulāya brāhmaṇiyā cittaṃ kopetuṃ asakkonto brāhmaṇānaṃ sakkāraṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. atha naṃ brāhmaṇā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne -- ``nayidāni tvaṃ brāhmaṇaladdhiko, ekāhampi brāhmaṇānaṃ sakkāraṃ na karosī''ti nippīḷenti. so gharaṃ āgantvā brāhmaṇiyā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā -- ``sace, bhoti ekadivasaṃ mukhaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkuṇeyyāsi, brāhmaṇānaṃ ekadivasaṃ bhikkhaṃ dadeyya''nti āha. tuyhaṃ deyyadhammaṃ ruccanakaṭṭhāne dehi, kiṃ mayhaṃ etthāti. so brāhmaṇe nimantetvā appodakaṃ pāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā gharañca sujjhāpetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā brāhmaṇe nisīdāpesi. brāhmaṇī mahāsāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā kaṭacchuṃ gahetvā parivisantī dussakaṇṇake pakkhalitvā ``brāhmaṇe parivisāmī''ti saññampi akatvā āsevanavasena sahasā satthārameva anussaritvā udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] brāhmaṇā udānaṃ sutvā ``ubhatopakkhiko ^a^P3.0452^ea^ esa samaṇassa gotamassa sahāyo, nāssa deyyadhammaṃ gaṇhissāmā''ti kupitā bhojanāni chaḍḍetvā nikkhamiṃsu. brāhmaṇo -- ``nanu paṭhamaṃyeva taṃ avacaṃ `ajjekadivasaṃ mukhaṃ rakkheyyāsī'ti, ettakaṃ te khīrañca taṇḍulādīni ca nāsitānī''ti ativiya kopavasaṃ upagato -- ``evameva panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, idāni tyāhaṃ vasali tassa satthuno vādaṃ āropessāmī''ti āha. atha naṃ brāhmaṇī ``gaccha tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, gantvā vijānissasī''ti vatvā ``na khvāhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke...pe0... vādaṃ āropeyyā''tiādimāha. so satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā --
[21] ``kiṃsu ^a^V3.0318^ea^ ^a^M3.0308^ea^ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu chetvā na socati.
[22] kissassu ekadhammassa, vadhaṃ rocesi gotamā''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.187) --
[25] pañhaṃ pucchi. satthā āha --
[21] ``kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati.
[27] kodhassa visamūlassa, madhuraggassa brāhmaṇa.
[22] vadhaṃ ariyā pasaṃsanti, tañhi chetvā na socatī''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.187) --

[25] pañhaṃ kathesi. so pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto. tasseva kaniṭṭhabhātā akkosakabhāradvājo nāma ``bhātā me pabbajito''ti sutvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā akkositvā bhagavatā vinīto pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto. aparo tassa kaniṭṭho sundarikabhāradvājo nāma. sopi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto. aparo tassa kaniṭṭho piṅgalabhāradvājo nāma. so pañhaṃ pucchitvā pañhabyākaraṇapariyosāne pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto. ^b^saṅgāravo^eb^ ^a^P3.0453^ea^ ^b^māṇavo^eb^ti ayaṃ tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho tasmiṃ divase brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ ekabhattagge nisinno. ^b^avabhūtāvā^eb^ti avaḍḍhibhūtā avamaṅgalabhūtāyeva. ^b^parabhūtāvā^eb^ti vināsaṃ pattāyeva. ^b^vijjamānāna^eb^nti vijjamānesu. ^b^sīlapaññāṇa^eb^nti sīlañca ñāṇañca na jānāsi.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ^b^diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhamme abhiññāte imasmiññeva attabhāve abhijānitvā vositavosānā hutvā pāramīsaṅkhātaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ pārabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ pattā mayanti vatvā ādibrahmacariyaṃ paṭijānantīti attho. ^b^ādibrahmacariya^eb^nti brahmacariyassa ādibhūtā uppādakā janakāti evaṃ paṭijānantīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^takkī^eb^ti takkagāhī. ^b^vīmaṃsī^eb^ti vīmaṃsako, paññācāraṃ carāpetvā evaṃvādī. ^b^tesāhamasmī^eb^ti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ ahamasmi aññataro.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ^b^aṭṭhitavata^eb^nti ^a^V3.0319^ea^ aṭṭhitatapaṃ, assa padhānapadena saddhiṃ sambandho, tathā sappurisapadassa. idañhi vuttaṃ hoti -- bhoto gotamassa aṭṭhitapadhānavataṃ ahosi, sappurisapadhānavataṃ ahosīti. ^b^atthi^eb^ ^a^P3.0454^ea^ ^b^devāti^eb^ ^a^M3.0309^ea^ ^b^puṭṭho samāno^eb^ti idaṃ māṇavo ``sammāsambuddho ajānantova pakāsesī''ti saññāya āha. ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^ti tumhākaṃ ajānanabhāve sante. ^b^tucchaṃ musā hotī^eb^ti tumhākaṃ kathā aphalā nipphalā hoti. evaṃ māṇavo bhagavantaṃ musāvādena niggaṇhāti nāma. ^b^viññunā purisenā^eb^ti paṇḍitena manussena. tvaṃ pana aviññutāya mayā byākatampi na jānāsīti dīpeti. ^b^uccena sammata^eb^nti uccena saddena sammataṃ pākaṭaṃ lokasmiṃ. ^b^adhidevā^eb^ti susudārakāpi hi devā nāma honti, deviyo nāma honti devā pana adhidevā nāma, loke devo devīti laddhanāmehi manussehi adhikāti attho. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
